The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Ki Draining Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition prone}, {@condition grappled}, or {@condition incapacitated} creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 17 ({@damage 5d6}) necrotic damage. The target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failure the target is forced to expend two hit dice, or drop to 0 HP if it cannot, and the jiangshi gains 17 ({@dice 5d6}) temporary hit points.
While it has these temporary hit points, the jiangshi has 20 AC, advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and a speed of 60 ft.

reaction.name: Whip Around
entries: As a reaction to being missed with an attack by a creature it is not facing, the jiangshi turns to face it and makes a claw attack.

monster.name: Jiangshi Sealbonded

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't peachwood

languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak them

trait.name: Breath Sight
entries: A creature that is holding its breath may attempt to hide from the jiangshi without being obsucred.

trait.name: Flammable
entries: If the jiangshi takes fire damage, it catches fire. Until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the jiangshi takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of the jiangshi's turns, and its attacks deal an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

trait.name: Hopping Movement
entries: The jiangshi is always facing a single direction, and must spend 5 feet of movement to change its facing. Additionally, it may spend 5 ft. of movement to stand from {@condition prone}. The jiangshi's reach extends only in the direction it is facing.

trait.name: Graceless
entries: If the jiangshi is struck with a melee attack from a direction it is not facing, it is pushed 5 feet away and must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The jiangshi makes two attacks, one of which can be a bite attack.

action.name: Claw Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. in the direction it is facing, one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the jiangshi adds one of the following effects:
The target is {@condition grappled}.
The target is pushed 10 ft. away.
The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Ki Draining Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition prone}, {@condition grappled}, or {@condition incapacitated} creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

reaction.name: Whip Around
entries: As a reaction to being missed with an attack by a creature it is not facing, the jiangshi turns to face it and makes a claw attack.

monster.name: Ghost
languages: Any languages it knew in life

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Spectral Weapons
entries: The ghost's attacks treat all creatures as unarmored (an unarmored creature's AC is usually 10 plus its Dexterity modifier.)

trait.name: Unfinished Business
entries: When the ghost is reduced to 0 HP, it does not die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, it loses the ability to take actions other than its Etherealness and Posession abilities, though it can still communicate. After {@dice 1d4} hours, the ghost recovers all of its HP. While at 0 HP, the ghost can be destroyed any of the following ways:
Resolving its unifinished business.
Subjecting it to the same conditions that killed it.
Performing funeral rites for it with the {@spell Ceremony|XGE} spell.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

action.name: Horrifying Visage
entries: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the ghost that can see it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages {@dice 1d4  10} years. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this ghost's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed with a {@spell greater restoration} spell, but only within 24 hours of it occurring.

reaction.name: Drifting Apparition
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the ghost may move up to half its speed.

reaction.name: Possession (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to taking damage, the ghost may force to the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the ghost; the ghost then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The ghost can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the ghost ends it as a bonus action, or the ghost is turned or forced out by an effect like the {@spell dispel evil and good} spell. When the possession ends, the ghost reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body.

trait.name: Snatcher
entries: If the ghoul has a creature {@condition grappled}, it may dash as a bonus action.

trait.name: Diseased Blood
entries: A creature that deals piercing or slashing damage to the ghoul with a melee attack must make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or contract {@disease ghoul fever|ConfC}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled}. If the target is a creature other than an elf or undead, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. The target makes this save at advantage in bright light or sunlight.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ghast must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the ghast's Stench for 24 hours.

trait.name: Turning Defiance
entries: The ghast and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Dead Blood Burst
entries: When the ghast dies, each creature within 10 feet must make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage and contract {@disease ghoul fever|ConfC}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled}. If the target is a creature other than an elf or undead, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. The target makes this save at advantage in bright light or sunlight.

trait.name: Gargantuan Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the gashadokuru  may spend 30 feet of movement to attempt a {@dc 17} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the gashadokuru's legs. A creature may attempt the same check to climb from the gashadokuru's legs to its back, or from its back to its head.

items.name: Legs
entries: While climbing on the gashadokuru's legs, a creature must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw at the start of its turn or fall off.

items.name: Back
entries: While climbing on the gashadokuru's back, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the gashadokuru, and the gashadokuru had disadvantage on attacks against it.

items.name: Head
entries: While climbing on the gashadokuru's head, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the gashadokuru, and the gashadokuru has vulnerability to bludgeoning damage the creature deals. If a creature on the gashadokuru's head scores a critical hit against it, the gashadokuru falls {@condition prone} at the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Stalker on the Road
entries: The gashadokuru is {@condition invisible} to creatures more than 15 ft. away from it.

trait.name: Rattling Wail
entries: A creature that the gashadokuru can see hears a faint chittering ringing in its ears that increases in volume as the gashadokuru approaches.

trait.name: Famished Aura
entries: Creatures within 5 miles of a gashadokuru must eat twice as much to avoid suffering {@condition exhaustion}.

trait.name: Sustained by Rage
entries: If the gashadokuru is reduced to 0 hit points while it has unexpended hit dice, it does not die. Instead, it falls {@condition prone} and cannot stand, and deals half as much damage with melee attacks. Whenever the gashadokuru makes an attack or starts its turn in sunlight, it must expend two hit dice. If it cannot, it dies.

trait.name: Ravenous Resistance
entries: If the gashadokuru fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead by expending four of its hit dice.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gashadokuru makes two attacks with its sweeping claws.

action.name: Sweeping Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 6d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}) and {@condition restrained}. Creatures within 5 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 5 ft. away.

action.name: Chattering Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition grappled} target. {@h}64 ({@damage 10d10 + 9}) slashing damage. On a critical hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be decapitated.

reaction.name: Crush
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack by a creature {@condition grappled} by it, the gashadokuru forces the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take 30 ({@damage 6d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The flameskull sheds either dim light in a 15-foot radius, or bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. It can switch between the options as an action.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The flameskull has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If the flameskull is destroyed, it regains all its hit points in 1 hour unless holy water is sprinkled on its remains or a {@spell dispel magic} or {@spell remove curse} spell is cast on them.

action.name: Spontaneous Combustion
entries: One creature within 60 feet must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage and ignite. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage at the end of each of its turns.

action.name: Fireburst
entries: One burning creature within 60 feet erupts into flame. Each creature within 20 feet must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Screaming Flame
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a melee attack, the flameskull may impose disadvantage on the triggering attack. Additionally, the attacker ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage at the end of each of its turns.

trait.name: Fungal Fortitude
entries: If the zombie starts its turn with 0 HP, it makes a {@dc 10} Constitution Saving Throw, unless it took radiant damage or a critical hit since its last turn. On a success, the zombie gains 1 hit point. A zombie with 0 HP is killed instantly if it is attacked.

trait.name: Spore Host
entries: {@dice 1d4} rounds after dying, the Fungal Zombie will release {@dice 1d4} Spore Globes. These are fully formed and begin floating away.

trait.name: Sudden Lunge
entries: The fungal zombie's attacks have a threat range of 10 feet for the purposes of making opportunity attacks. When it makes an opportunity attack against a creature more than 5 feet away, it moves 5 feet towards its target as part of the attack.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage. On a hit, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Death Grip
entries: A {@condition grappled} creature must make a {@dc 13} Strength Saving Throw. On a failure, the zombie grows fungal shoots around its target and restrains it (escape {@dc 13}), then dies. It maintains its restraint while dead.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.

trait.name: Black Ice Aura
entries: The area in a 10 foot radius around the dragon is difficult terrain. A creature that enters it for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity Saving Throw or fall {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes four  attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, and one with its tail. It can't make its bite and tail attacks against the same target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Paralyzing Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage. If the target is {@condition stunned}, it must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the dracolich's turn.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 15 feet away from the dragon.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Blizzard Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw, taking 72 ({@damage 16d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Until the end of the dragon's next turn, the area is difficult terrain and heavily obscured.

action.name: Ice Tomb Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a burst of ice in a 90-foot cone that clings to living creatures, sapping their vitality. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a creature gains 45 ({@dice 10d8}) temporary HP. As long as it has this temporary HP, the creature is {@condition restrained}, {@condition blinded}, and has vulnerability to fire damage. A creature that starts its turn with any of this temporary HP must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be forced to expend two hit dice. If it cannot, it drops to 0 HP.

reaction.name: Sudden Pounce
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 80 feet of the dragon ending its turn further away than it started, the dragon moves up to its speed toward the creature without provoking attacks of opportunity and makes a claw attack. If the target is {@condition frightened}, it must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the dragon's next turn.

reaction.name: Consume Vitality
entries: As a reaction to passing a saving throw caused by a spell, the dracolich may force the spell caster to make a {@dc 16} Constitution Saving Throw. On a failed save, the spell caster expends 2 hit die, and the dragon heals itself for 37 ({@dice 2d20 + 16}). If the spell caster can't expend any hit dice, it drops to 0 HP instead.

legendary.name: Raise Hackles
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or lose any immunity it has to the dragon's Frightful Presence or the {@condition frightened} condition..

legendary.name: Terrorize
entries: One {@condition frightened} creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage. On the creature's next turn, it must use its movement to run away from the dragon.

legendary.name: Uttercold
entries: The dragon draws on its deepest reserves. Until the end of its next turn, cold damage the dragon deals ignores damage resistance, and the dragon loses one of its legendary resistances.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Searing Aura
entries: When a creature without fire resistance starts its turn within 10 feet of the dragon, it catches fire and begins to burn. Until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Paralyzing Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage. If the target is {@condition stunned}, it must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the dracolich's turn.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Necrofire Wake {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon moves up to its fly speed, and a 10-foot wide section of the ground it passes over  erupts in a wall of black flames that lasts until the end of the dragon's next turn as it strafes with its breath. When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 91 ({@damage 26d6}) fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful save. A creature takes the same damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. A creature in the wall that would receive healing instead takes an equal amount of necrotic damage.

action.name: Malicious Flame Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon breathes malicious intent into all flames in a 90-foot cone. The dragon summons a fire elemental in the space of each creature in the area that is on fire. The fire elementals act on initiative count 20.

reaction.name: Wilting Glare
entries: As a reaction to being struck with an attack, the dracolich may force the attacker to make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the dracolich's next turn.

reaction.name: Billowing Wings
entries: As a reaction to taking 30 or more damage from a single source, the dracolich may shroud itself in smoke, then immediately move up to half its speed. The area in 60 foot radius becomes heavily obscured until the end of the dracolich's next turn.

legendary.name: Manipulate Flames
entries: One creature within 90 feet of the dragon and within 30 feet of a flame must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage and catch fire. Until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

legendary.name: Inhale
entries: The dragon rolls to recharge one of its breath weapons.

legendary.name: Tail Sweep (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage, be knocked {@condition prone}, and pushed up to 15 feet away from the dragon.

trait.name: Forest Walk
entries: The dragon's movement is not impeded by natural or magical foliage.

trait.name: Fouling Aura
entries: A creature that imbibes a potion within 30 feet of the dragon takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage, in addition to the potion's other effects. The poison damage occurs before any other effects.

trait.name: Camouflage
entries: The dragon has advantage on stealth checks if it is more than 30 feet from any hostile creature.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three  attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage. The target must then make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or lose any resistance to poison damage. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more also loses any immunity to poison damage and the {@condition poisoned} condition.

action.name: Paralyzing Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage. If the target is {@condition stunned}, it must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the dracolich's turn.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 15 feet away from the dragon.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Miasma Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a poisonous cloud in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw, taking 77 ({@damage 22d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is {@condition stunned} until the end of the dragon's next turn. Until the dragon uses this ability again, the area is heavily obscured and a creature that ends its turn in the area must repeat the save.

action.name: Entangling Breath
entries: Barbed vines burst from the ground in a 90-foot cone. Each creature must make a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained}. Until the dragon uses this ability again, the area is difficult terrain. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) piercing damage for every 5 feet it travels.

reaction.name: Adapt Camouflage
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a ranged attack, the dragon may match its appearance to its immediate surroundings. Until the end of its next turn, the dragon becomes {@condition invisible} to creatures more than 30 feet away from it.

reaction.name: Savage
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 20 feet resisting or negating a source of poison damage, the dragon may move up to half its speed and makes a bite attack against the creature.

reaction.name: Murderous Glare (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to a creature reducing it below 100 HP, the dragon unleashes a torrent of negative energy at it. If the creature has fewer than 100 HP, it dies.

legendary.name: Blinding Venom
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the dragon's next turn.

legendary.name: Snatch
entries: The dragon makes a claw attack against a creature that it is hidden from. If the attack hits, the target is {@condition grappled}, {@condition stunned}, and hidden from its allies until the beginning of its next turn. This attack does not automatically reveal the dragon's position.

legendary.name: Slink Away (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon moves up to half its fly speed. Attacks of opportunity provoked by this movement are made at disadvantage. If it ends this movement in at least half cover, it may immediately attempt to hide.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Building Charge
entries: When the dragon rolls to recharge its lightning breath, creatures within 10 feet of it take {@damage 2d6} lightning damage. If the dragon succesfully recharges its lightning breath, creatures within 10 feet of it take an additional {@damage 2d6} lightning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Paralyzing Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) slashing damage. If the target is {@condition stunned}, it must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the dracolich's turn.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Animating Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales lightning in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw, taking 88 ({@damage 16d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A corpse in the affected area rises at the beginning of the dracolich's next turn as a flesh golem under the dracolich's control. A living creature with 0 HP in the area must make an additional death save. If it succeeds, it regains 1 HP.

action.name: Dessication Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon inhales, draining the moisture from a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that cone must make a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw, taking 90 ({@damage 20d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature reduced to 0 HP by this damage is unaffected by the next source of healing it would receive in the next minute. Potions in the affected area turn to sand.

reaction.name: Wilting Glare
entries: As a reaction to being struck with an attack, the dracolich may force the attacker to make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the dracolich's next turn.

reaction.name: Discharge
entries: As a reaction to passing a saving throw against a spell, the dracolich may force the spell's caster to take {@damage 1d10} damage per level of the spell.

legendary.name: Ionic Attunement
entries: One creature within 60 feet must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or lose any lightning resistance that it has and suffer disadvantage on its next Dexterity saving throw in the next minute.

legendary.name: Gather Charge
entries: The dragon moves up to its walk or burrow speed. If it is hit with an attack in the course of this movement, it may immediately roll to recharge one of its breath weapons. It may move through creations of magical force with this movement, destroying them.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Sensitivity Aura
entries: Attacks against creatures that do not have acid resistance or immunity within 15 feet of the dragon score a critical hit on a roll of 18, 19, or 20.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Acid Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) acid damage. If the target is wearing metal armor or a metal shield, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed.

action.name: Paralyzing Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage. If the target is {@condition stunned}, it must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the dracolich's turn.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Salt Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a hail of white salt in a 90-foot cone that crusts over creatures in the area, smelling strongly of chlorine. Each creature in the cone must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, suffering vulnerability to acid damage for the next minute on a failed save. A creature with resistance to acid damage instead has that resistance negated for the next minute.

action.name: Flesh Melting Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 67 ({@damage 15d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more suffers deformities, and has disadvantage on ability checks, saving throws, and attacks based on Strength or Dexterity.

reaction.name: Wilting Glare
entries: As a reaction to being struck with an attack, the dracolich may force the attacker to make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the dracolich's next turn.

reaction.name: Cruel Jest
entries: As a reaction when a creature attempts to leave the dragon's reach, the dragon may force it to make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be dragged 10 feet back towards the dragon. If the creature fails this save by 5 or more, this ability does not use the dragon's reaction.

legendary.name: Vomit Swarm
entries: The dragon creates a Swarm of Insects within 15 feet of it that acts on initiative count 20.

legendary.name: Mire
entries: The dragon disturbs the earth around it. A creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of the dragon begins to sink into the earth, and must make a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage on dexterity saves, has a -2 penalty to its AC, and can't make more than a single attack in a turn. These effects last until the end of the dragon's next turn.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

monster.name: Demilich (Ascetic)
languages: Common plus up to five other languages

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the demilich is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The demilich is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Weightless Careening
entries: Whenever the demilich takes damage from a source it is not resistant to, it is pushed 30 ft. away from the source. If it hits a wall or object, it bounces.

trait.name: Paralyzing Aura
entries: A creature that damages the lich with a melee attack must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the lich's next turn, or until the creature takes damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The demilich uses baleful telekinesis four times.

action.name: Baleful Telekinesis
entries: One creature within 60 ft that the demilich can see must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be moved 30 ft. If this movement carries the creature into a wall or other solid surface, the target takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Wrench Heart (7th level spell, concentration)
entries: One creature within 60 feet that the demilich can see feels a spectral hand sink into its chest and grip its heart. At the begining of each of the creature's turns it takes 45 ({@damage 10d8}) necrotic damage and must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Disintegrate (6th level spell)
entries: One creature within 60 feet must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 80 ({@damage 10d6 + 45}) force damage, or half damage on a success. If this damage reduces a creature to 0 HP, they are disintegrated.

reaction.name: Shield (1st level spell)
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with an attack, the demiLich may add 5 to its AC until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Spelldrain Cackle
entries: As a reaction to seeing a creature cast a spell within 60 feet, the demilich forces the spell caster to succeed on a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw or have the spell fail and its highest level unexpended spell slot drained.

reaction.name: Howl (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 154 hit points, the demilich emits a bloodcurdling howl. Each creature within 30 feet that can hear the howl must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or drop to 0 hit points. A creature that fails by 5 or more dies.

legendary.name: Life Drain
entries: One creature within 10 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or be forced to expend a number of hit dice equal to the amount it failed by. A creature that cannot instead drops to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Chatter
entries: Each creature within 30 ft. that is concentrating  and can hear the demilich must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or lose concentration.

legendary.name: Choking Dust
entries: The area within 10 ft. of the demilich becomes heavily obscured until the end of its next turn. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or be unable to speak or breathe until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the demilich is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The demilich is immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: Howl {@recharge 5}
entries: The demilich emits a bloodcurdling howl. Each creature within 30 feet that can hear the howl must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or drop to 0 hit points. On a successful save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: The demilich targets up to three creatures that it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be forced to expend a number of hit dice equal to the amount it failed by. A creature that cannot instead drops to 0 hit points.

reaction.name: Weightless Careening
entries: As a reaction to taking damage from a source it is not resistant to, the demilich moves its full speed away from the source without provoking attacks of opportunity. If it hits a wall or object, it bounces.

reaction.name: Mindlost Cackle
entries: As a reaction to passing a saving throw against a spell, the demilich forces the spell caster to succeed on a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw or have its highest level unexpended spell slot drained.

legendary.name: Chatter
entries: Each creature within 30 ft. that is concentrating  and can hear the demilich must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or lose concentration.

legendary.name: Choking Dust
entries: The area within 10 ft. of the demilich becomes heavily obscured until the end of its next turn. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be unable to speak or breathe until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Wither
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that the demilich can see takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Soul Bound in Steel
entries: The death knight's soul resides in its weapon. While it wields its weapon, it has resistance to all damage but force and radiant. If it is disarmed, its movement speed is halved and it can't take actions except to recover the weapon. A destroyed Death Knight gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the weapon.

trait.name: Fear Eater
entries: The death knight scores a critical hit on a roll of 15-20 on attacks made against a creature that is {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The death knight has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The death knight uses its Fearsome Gaze and makes two longsword attacks, one of which it may replace with a Slaying Smite, if available.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage, and one magic effect on the target ends. A construct of force struck with this attack is destroyed.

action.name: Slaying Smite {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage plus 27 ({@damage 5d10}) necrotic damage. If this damage reduces a creature below 20 hit points, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or die.

action.name: Fearsome Gaze
entries: One creature within 10 feet must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Hellfire Orb (1/Day)
entries: The death knight hurls a magical ball of fire that explodes at a point it can see within 120 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage and 35 ({@damage 10d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Counterattack
entries: The death knight adds 6 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. If this causes the attack to miss, the death knight may make a longsword attack as part of this reaction.

reaction.name: Overpower
entries: As a reaction to missing a creature with a melee attack, the Death Knight may add 10 to its attack roll. If this causes the attack to hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and be unable to stand until the end of the Death Knight's next turn, in addition to the attack's other effects.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The swarm is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Awful Fingers
entries: A creature that enters or starts its turn in the swarm's space has disadvantage on checks to maintain Concentration and must make a {@dc 10} Constitution check to maintain Concentration at the end of each of its turns while it remains within the swarm.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny crawling claw. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 0 ft ., up to four creatures in the swarm's space. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning or slashing damage (claw's choice), and the target is _grappled_ and _restrained_ until it escapes ({@dc 13}).

action.name: Squick
entries: A creature the claws are grabbing must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom Saving Throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} of the claw until the end of the claw's next turn, and must use its action to try to kill or dislodge the claws.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The claw is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Muderous Intent
entries: The claw may pick up and wield unattended weapons and improvised weapons without the Heavy or Two-Handed trait. It is proficient with all such weapons.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning or slashing damage (claw's choice).

action.name: Grab
entries: The claw targets one medium or smaller creature within 5 feet. The target must make a {@dc 11} Strength Saving throw or be grabbed. While grabbed, the creature's movement is reduced by 5 ft., the claw moves with it, and when it makes an attack roll it rolls a {@dice d4} and subtracts it from the total. The claw may be dislodged as an action with a successful {@dc 11} Strength (Athletics) check.

action.name: Squick
entries: A creature the claw is grabbing must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom Saving Throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} of the claw until the end of the claw's next turn, and must use its action to try to kill or dislodge the claw.

reaction.name: Scuttle
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with an attack while grabbing a creature, the claw may release its grab and move up to 5 feet. If this movement makes it an invalid target for the attack, the attack instead targets the creature the claw was grabbing.

trait.name: Thawing Permafrost
entries: If the walker takes any fire damage, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or lose its damage resistances and gain the ability to Dash as a Bonus Action for the next minute.

trait.name: Blinding Light
entries: The walker sheds bright light in a 20 ft. radius and dim light for an additional 20 ft.
As a bonus action, the walker can force one creature in its bright light to succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of the walker's next turn.

trait.name: Icy Doom
entries: A creature killed by the walker freezes for 9 days, during which time it can't be thawed, animated or raised from the dead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The walker makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Cold Ray {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that the walker can see must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 49 ({@damage 9d10}) cold damage, or half as much on a success. A {@condition grappled} creature makes this save at disadvantage.

reaction.name: Chill Weapon
entries: As a reaction to being hit by a melee attack

with a metal weapon, the walker forces the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage and drop its weapon. If the creature attempts to pick the weapon up this turn, it must repeat the save.

trait.name: Damage Transfer
entries: While it is grappling a creature, the bonelesss takes only half the damage dealt to it by creatures it is not grappling, and the creature {@condition grappled} by the boneless takes the other half.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The boneless can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage and the boneless wraps itself around the target (escape {@dc 11}). While the boneless is wrapped around it, a creature cannot speak or breathe, and the boneless moves with the target.

action.name: Throttle
entries: One creature the boneless is wrapped around must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or have the air driven from its lungs and begin to suffocate.

monster.name: Boneclaw Night Terror
languages: Common plus the main language of its master

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: While its master lives, a destroyed boneclaw gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} hours, with all its hit points. The new body appears within 1 mile of the boneclaw's master.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the boneclaw can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The boneclaw makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Piercing Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, the boneclaw can pull the target up to 10 feet toward itself, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). The boneclaw has two claws. While a claw grapples a target, the claw can attack only that target.

action.name: Shadow Snatch
entries: One target creature within 15 feet that the boneclaw is hidden from must make a {@dc 14} dexterity saving throw. On a failure the creature takes 52 ({@damage 8d12}) necrotic damage, is {@condition stunned} until the end of the boneclaw's next turn and is hidden from its allies. If the creature fails, this action does not reveal the hidden boneclaw's position.

action.name: Douse
entries: The boneclaw reduces a source of bright light to dim light, or extinguishes a source of dim light. If the boneclaw is hidden, this action does not reveal its position.

monster.name: Boneclaw
languages: Common plus the main language of its master

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: While its master lives, a destroyed boneclaw gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} hours, with all its hit points. The new body appears within 1 mile of the boneclaw's master.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the boneclaw can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The boneclaw makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Piercing Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, the boneclaw can pull the target up to 10 feet toward itself, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). The boneclaw has two claws. While a claw grapples a target, the claw can attack only that target.

action.name: Shadow Jump
entries: If the boneclaw is in dim light or darkness, each creature of the boneclaw's choice within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 34 ({@damage 5d12 + 2}) necrotic damage. The boneclaw then magically teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It can bring one creature it's grappling, teleporting that creature to an unoccupied space it can see within 5 feet of its destination. The destination spaces of this teleportation must be in dim light or darkness.

action.name: Douse
entries: The boneclaw reduces a source of bright light to dim light, or extinguishes a source of dim light. This action does not reveal a hidden boneclaw's position.

trait.name: Death Gaze
entries: The bodak's eyes reflect the horror that {@condition frightened} it to death. A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the bodak and can see its eyes must succeed a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more instead drops to 0 HP. A creature that is immune to the {@condition frightened} condition makes this save at advantage. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn.  If the creature does so, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the bodak until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Aura of Annihilation
entries: Creatures within 30 feet of the bodak fail death saves automatically, cannot be stabilized without regaining at least one Hit Point. Additionally, creatures of the bodak's choice that start their turn in the aura take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage. A creature that dies in this aura rises as a bodak after 24 hours.

trait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: The bodak is forced to close its eyes while in sunlight.

trait.name: Fear is Where It Lives
entries: The bodak is always {@condition frightened}. If another effect would subject the bodak to the {@condition frightened} condition, it instead gains 36 ({@dice 8d8}) temporary HP.

action.name: Soul Drain
entries: One creature within 5 feet of the bodak must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 44 ({@damage 8d10}) necrotic damage and be forced to expend two of its hit dice. If the creature can't, it instead drops to 0 HP.

action.name: Share Horror {@recharge 5}
entries: The bodak opens its mind to those around it. Each creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} by the bodak until the end of its next turn. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature cannot avert its eyes.

trait.name: Death Gaze
entries: The bodak's eyes reflect the horror that {@condition frightened} it to death. A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the bodak and can see its eyes must succeed a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more instead drops to 0 HP. A creature that is immune to the {@condition frightened} condition makes this save at advantage. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn.  If the creature does so, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the bodak until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Aura of Annihilation
entries: Creatures within 30 feet of the bodak fail death saves automatically, and cannot be stabilized without regaining at least one Hit Point. A creature that dies in this aura rises as a bodak after 24 hours.

trait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: The bodak is forced to close its eyes while in sunlight.

trait.name: Fear is Where It Lives
entries: The bodak is always {@condition frightened}. If another effect would subject the bodak to the {@condition frightened} condition, it instead gains 18 ({@dice 4d8}) temporary HP.

action.name: Soul Drain
entries: One creature within 5 feet of the bodak must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) necrotic damage and be forced to expend two of its hit dice. If the creature can't, it instead drops to 0 HP.

action.name: Share Horror {@recharge 5}
entries: The bodak opens its mind to those around it. Each creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} by the bodak until the end of its next turn. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature cannot avert its eyes.

monster.name: Mr Bean Sdhe
languages: Any languages it knew in life

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The banshee can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Ill Omen
entries: When initiative is rolled, the creature with the highest passive perception among hostile creatures must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or be doomed. A doomed creature subtracts {@dice 1d8} from any Wisdom saving throws it makes for the next minute. If multiple creatures are tied for highest, they all must make this save.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Weightless
entries: Whenever the banshee takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from its source.

trait.name: Spectral Weapons
entries: The banshee's attacks treat all creatures as unarmored (an unarmored creature's AC is usually 10 plus its Dexterity modifier.)

trait.name: Unfinished Business
entries: When the banshee is reduced to 0 HP, it does not die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, it loses the ability to take actions other than its Etherealness ability, though it can still communicate. After 24 hours, the banshee recovers all of its HP. While at 0 HP, the banshee can be destroyed any of the following ways:
Resolving its unifinished business.
Subjecting it to the same conditions that killed it.
Performing funeral rites for it with the {@spell Ceremony|XGE} spell.

action.name: Corrupting Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The banshee enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

action.name: Horrifying Visage
entries: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the banshee that can see her must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the banshee is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the banshee's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Drifting Apparition
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the banshee may move up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.

reaction.name: Wail (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 29 HP, the banshee releases a mournful wail, provided that she isn't in sunlight. This wail has no effect on constructs and undead. All other creatures within 30 feet of her that can hear her must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success, a creature takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) psychic damage.

reaction.name: Possession (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to taking damage, the banshee may force to the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the banshee; the banshee then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. The banshee now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The banshee can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the banshee ends it as a bonus action, or the banshee is turned or forced out by an effect like the {@spell dispel evil and good} spell. When the possession ends, the banshee reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body.

monster.name: Banshee
languages: Any languages it knew in life

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The banshee can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Ill Omen
entries: When initiative is rolled, the creature with the highest passive perception among hostile creatures must succeed on a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw or be doomed. A doomed creature subtracts {@dice 1d8} from any Wisdom saving thros it makes for the next minute. If multiple creatures are tied for highest, they all must make this save.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Weightless
entries: Whenever the banshee takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from its source.

trait.name: Spectral Weapons
entries: The banshee's attacks treat all creatures as unarmored (an unarmored creature's AC is usually 10 plus its Dexterity modifier.)
