trait.name: Brave
entries: The gladiator has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Favor of the Crowd
entries: If it has an audience, whenever the gladiator scores a critical hit or reduces an opponent to 0 hit points it gains the favor of the crowd. While it has the favor of the crowd, it gains the following benefits:
The gladiator scores a critical on a roll of 18, 19, or 20.
The gladiator has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
If the gladiator starts its turn with 0 hit points, it regains 10 hit points and loses the favor of the crowd.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gladiator makes three attacks, one of which it may replace with a use of its Rile, if available.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Rile {@recharge 5}
entries: The gladiator attempts a {@dc 15} Charisma (Performance) check. On a success, the gladiator gains the favor of the crowd.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The gladiator adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the gladiator must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Fiendmarked
entries: The fanatic appears fiendish to any ability that can detect extraplanar essences.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the fanatic's darkvision.

action.name: Ritual Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. *Hit* 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, one extraplanar ally within 60 ft. gains 21 ({@dice 6d6}) temporary hit points. While it has these temporary hit points, the ally has advantage on attack rolls.

action.name: Cinder Chant
entries: One creature within 60 ft. must make a {@dc 12} Charmisma saving throw. On a failed save, a creature subtracts a cumulative {@dice 1d6} from Dexterity saving throws it makes before the end of the fanatic's next turn.
A creature that subtracts 8 or more from its saving throw in this way gains vulnerability to the effect's damage, if applicable.

reaction.name: Bleed For Your Master
entries: As a reaction to a friendly extraplanar creature failing a saving throw, the fanatic makes an attack against itself. If the attack hits, it is a critical hit.

reaction.name: Empowering Cull (1/Day)

A creature that subtracts 8 or more from its saving throw in this way gains vulnerability to the effect's damage, if applicable.

entries: One creature within 60 ft. that is engulfed in magical darkness must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or have its movement reduced by 10 ft. until the end of its next turn. A creature whose movement is reduced to 0 in this way is {@condition paralyzed}.

trait.name: Leviathan's Anchor
entries: Whenever the fanatic hits a creature that is submerged in water but does not have a swim speed with an attack, the target is dragged 5 ft. deeper underwater.

trait.name: Brinewarded
entries: Aquatic creatures with an Intelligence score of 3 or less are indifferent to the fanatic.

trait.name: Curse of Buoyancy
entries: A creature that reduces the fanatic to 0 hit points must make a {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. A cursed creature that is submerged in water ascends 20 ft. at the beginning of each of its turns if it is holding its breath.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Ritual Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. *Hit* 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, one friendly aquatic creature within 60 ft. gains 21 ({@dice 6d6}) temporary hit points. While it has these temporary hit points, the creature has advantage on attack rolls.

action.name: Call of the Deep
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that is holding its breath must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or lose one minute of held breath. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more loses any spell or magical effect that allows it to breathe water.

entries: Whenever the cultist hits a creature that is submerged in water but does not have a swim speed with an attack, the target is dragged 5 ft. deeper underwater.

action.name: Call of the Deep
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that is holding its breath must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or lose one minute of held breath. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more loses any spell or magical effect that allows it to breathe water.

trait.name: Power of the Mob
entries: When making Strength (Athletics) checks and Wisdom saving throws to avoid being {@condition frightened}, the commoner rolls an additional {@dice d20} for each other commoner adjacent to it and takes the highest result rolled.

action.name: Improvised Weapon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Trample
entries: Target {@condition prone} creature within 5 feet of the commoner takes 1 bludgeoning damage for each commoner adjacent to the target.

trait.name: Fear Eater
entries: The blackguard scores a critical hit on a roll of 17-20 on attacks made against a creature that is {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The blackguard has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The blackguard uses its Fearsome Gaze and makes three glaive attacks, one of which it may replace with a Blackguard's Challenge, if available.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Blackguard's Challenge {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be forced to meet the blackguard in melee combat. On its following turn, the creature must use its full movement to move directly toward the blackguard.

action.name: Fearsome Gaze
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Counterattack
entries: The blackguard adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. If this causes the attack to miss, the blackguard may make a glaive attack as part of this reaction.

trait.name: Thieves' Bravado
entries: While the bandit has more allies than enemies within 30 feet, it has advantage on attacks and Wisdom saving throws. While it has fewer allies than enemies within 30 feet, it has disadvantage on attacks and Wisdom saving throws.

trait.name: Hostage Taker
entries: While the bandit has a creature {@condition grappled}, it has +2 to its AC and advantage on attacks against the {@condition grappled} creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The captain makes three attacks with its dagger, or two with its crossbow.

action.name: Hooked Dagger

entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80 ft./320 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: I'm Serious!
entries: As a reaction to seeing a creature make an attack against the bandit or its allies, the bandit may make a dagger attack against a {@condition grappled} creature.

trait.name: Thieves' Bravado
entries: While the bandit has more allies than enemies within 30 feet, it has advantage on attacks and Wisdom saving throws. While it has fewer allies than enemies within 30 feet, it has disadvantage on attacks and Wisdom saving throws.

trait.name: Pocket Sand
entries: When the bandit misses with a melee attack it may hurl sand at the same target as a bonus action. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the bandit's next turn.

action.name: Cutpurse Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity Saving Throw or have an item that is worn or carried, but not wielded, stolen.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80 ft./320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Mageslayer Assassin
languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: The asssassin can't be affected or detected by spells of 2nd level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Cunnning Action
entries: The assassin can take the Dash, Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The assassin makes two longblade sica attacks.

action.name: Longblade Sica
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage and 28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage. Attacks with this weapon ignore any AC benefit granted by a shield.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage and 28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Study Mark
entries: The assassin examines the vulnerabilities of a creature it is hidden from. The assassin's critical range for attacks made against the target increases by 3 for the next minute, to a minimum of 11. As a reaction, the target may attempt a Wisdom (Perception) check to spot the assassin.

action.name: Behead
entries: The assassin removes the head from a corpse within 5 ft. to prevent its resurrection.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack by an attacker that it can see, the assassin halves the attack's damage against it.

reaction.name: Spell Denial
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 5 ft. attempting to cast a spell, the assassin makes a melee attack against it. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or have the spell fail.

monster.name: Assassin
languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Cunnning Action
entries: The assassin can take the Dash, Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The assassin makes two longblade sica attacks.

action.name: Longblade Sica
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage and 17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage. Attacks with this weapon ignore any AC benefit granted by a shield.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage and 17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Study Mark
entries: The assassin examines the vulnerabilities of a creature it is hidden from. The assassin's critical range for attacks made against the target increases by 3 for the next minute, to a minimum of 11. As a reaction, the target may attempt a Wisdom (Perception) check to spot the assassin.

action.name: Behead
entries: The assassin removes the head from a corpse within 5 ft. to prevent its resurrection.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack by an attacker that it can see, the assassin halves the attack's damage against it.

trait.name: Fear of Fire
entries: If the yeti takes fire damage, attacks against it have advantage until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The yeti has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The yeti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

trait.name: Huge Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the yeti may spend half of its movement to attempt a {@dc 19} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the giant. While climbing on the giant, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the giant, and the giant has disadvantage on melee attacks against it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage and be pushed 10 feet back. This attack does an additional 28 ({@damage 8d6}) cold damage to a creature {@condition restrained} by its chilling gaze.

action.name: Chilling Gaze
entries: The yeti targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw against this magic or fall {@condition prone} and take 10 ({@damage 6d6}) cold damage and then gain 7 ({@dice 2d6}) temporary HP, unless it is immune to cold damage. While it has this temporary HP, the creature is {@condition restrained} and can't breathe or speak.

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge}
entries: The yeti exhales a 30-foot cone of frigid air. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The affected area becomes difficult terrain and when a creature moves into or within the area, it takes {@damage 2d4} piercing damage for every 5 feet it travels.

reaction.name: Freezing Roar
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack from a creature climbing on it, the yeti may roar at it. The creature must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 3d8}) cold damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the yeti's next turn.

trait.name: Fear of Fire
entries: If the yeti takes fire damage, it cannot use its Chilling Gaze on its following turn.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The yeti has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The yeti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage. This attack does an additional 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage to a creature {@condition restrained} by its chilling gaze.

action.name: Chilling Gaze
entries: The yeti targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw against this magic or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage and then gain 7 ({@dice 2d6}) temporary HP, unless it is immune to cold damage. While it has this temporary HP, the creature is {@condition restrained} and can't breathe or speak.

trait.name: Baying Pack
entries: A group of two or more worgs has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

trait.name: Predatory Bearing
entries: A creature that starts its turn with no adjacent allies and that can see the gulvoorg must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Crushing Weight
entries: The gulvoorg may enter the space of a {@condition prone} creature. A {@condition prone} creature that starts its turn in the gulvoorg's space must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) bludgeoning damage and be unable to stand this turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The worg makes three attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the gulvoorg can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the gulvoorg.

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by both the gulvoorg and at least one of the gulvoorg's Large or larger allies must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 49 ({@damage 14d6}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the worg moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the worg can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Baying Pack
entries: A group of two or more worgs has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

trait.name: Predatory Bearing
entries: A creature that starts its turn with no adjacent allies and that can see the worg must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The worg makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the worg can grapple the target (escape {@dc 14}).

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by both the worg and at least one of the worg's allies must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the worg moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the worg can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Baying Pack
entries: A group of three or more worgs has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the worg can grapple the target (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by both the worg and at least one of the worg's allies must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Predatory Bearing
entries: A creature that starts its turn with no adjacent allies and that can see the wolf must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@dice 2d6 + 4}) piercing and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage. Instead of dealing damage, the wolf can grapple the target (escape {@dc 13}). If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by the wolf and at least one of its allies must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 31 ({@damage 9d6}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The wolf exhales a blast of freezing wind in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Chilling Howl (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 52 hit points, the wolf lets out a howl that shatters glass and freezes the earth. The ground in a 20 ft. radius is covered in ice, becoming difficult terrain. {@condition frightened} creatures in the area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the wolf's next turn.

trait.name: Confusing Gaze
entries: When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the umber hulk and is able to see the umber hulk's eyes, the umber hulk can magically force it to make a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw, unless the umber hulk is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed saving throw, until the beginning of its next turn any movement the creature makes is made in a direction of the umber hulk's choice.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The umber hulk can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5 foot-wide, 8-foot-high tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The umber hulk makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its mandibles.

action.name: Frenetic Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target is affected by the umber hulk's confusing gaze, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or use its reaction to move its full speed.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Disorient
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with an attack, the umber hulk can impose disadvantage on the attack. If the attack misses, the attacker falls {@condition prone} and can't stand this turn.

trait.name: Lie Dormant
entries: The tomb scarab can go an indefinite period of time without food or water, so long as it has somewhere dry and dark to hibernate.

trait.name: Horrid Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect.

When the swarm enters another creature's space, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature may move up to half its speed as a reaction if it has its reaction available.

action.name: Tunneling Bites
entries: One creature within 5 ft must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or have {@dice 1d4} scarabs tunnel under its flesh. At the start of each of its turns, the creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage per scarab infesting it.

Applying fire to the bite wound before the end of the target's next turn deals 1 fire damage to the target and kills these tomb scarabs. After this time, these tomb scarabs can only be extricated with a {@dc 13} Wisdom (Medicine) check, dealing 3 ({@dice 1d6}) points of piercing damage to the afflicted creature as it is removed. Any effect that cures disease destroys all tomb scarabs infesting the target.

trait.name: Lie Dormant
entries: The tomb scarab can go an indefinite period of time without food or water, so long as it has somewhere dry and dark to hibernate.

action.name: Tunneling Bite
entries: One creature within 5 ft must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or have the scarab tunnel under its flesh. At the start of each of its turns, the creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage per scarab infesting it.

Applying fire to the bite wound before the end of the target's next turn deals 1 fire damage to the target and kills the tomb scarab. After this time, the tomb scarab can only be extricated with a {@dc 12} Wisdom (Medicine) check, dealing 3 ({@dice 1d6}) points of piercing damage to the afflicted creature as it is removed. Any effect that cures disease destroys all tomb scarabs infesting the target.

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks and from attacks made without advantage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the tarrasque fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The tarrasque has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Invulnerable Hide
entries: Any time the tarrasque is targeted by a {@spell magic missile} spell, a line spell, or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, the tarrasque is unaffected. Instead, the next weapon attack that targets the tarrasque has advantage.

trait.name: Eternal Threat
entries: When the Tarrasque is reduced to 0 HP, it does not die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, it cannot take actions other than to dash. While at 0 HP, it can be killed with a {@spell Wish} spell.

trait.name: Slow to Wrath
entries: When the Tarrasque is reduced to 400 HP, it gains a fourth legendary action and immediately regains all spent actions.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tarrasque can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes five attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, one with its horns, and one with its tail. It can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the tarrasque can't bite another target.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) slashing damage.

action.name: Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10ft., one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 4d10 + 10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 20ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the tarrasque's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the tarrasque is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the tarrasque's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The tarrasque makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the tarrasque, and it takes 56 ({@damage 16d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the tarrasque's turns.

If the tarrasque takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the tarrasque must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the tarrasque. If the tarrasque dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Erupt
entries: The Tarrasque bursts out of the ground. Each creature in a 60 foot radius must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 42 ({@damage 12d6}) bludgeoning damage and is {@condition stunned} until the end of the Tarrasque's next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

reaction.name: Reflective
entries: As a reaction, the tarrasque may reflect a spell that targets it back at the caster as though it originated from the tarrasque, turning the caster into the target.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The tarrasque makes one claw attack or tail attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The tarrasque moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Chomp (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The tarrasque makes one bite attack or uses its Swallow.

legendary.name: Bone-Shattering Roar (Costs 4 Actions)
entries: The tarrasque emits a titanic roar in a 600-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 135 ({@damage 30d8}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is permanantly {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Iron Scent
entries: The rust monster can pinpoint, by scent, the location of ferrous metal within 30 feet of it.

trait.name: Rust Metal
entries: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the rust monster corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the rust monster is destroyed after dealing damage.

trait.name: Oxide Armor
entries: Whenever the Rust Monster takes acid or lightning damage, its AC is reduced by 2, until the end of its next turn. Whenever the Rust Monster takes fire damage, its AC is improved by 2 until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The rust monster uses its antennae and attacks twice with its bite. It may use its disrupt magic ability in place of its antennae.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Antennae
entries: The rust monster corrodes a nonmagical ferrous metal object it can see within 5 feet of it. If the object isn't being worn or carried, the touch destroys a 1-foot cube of it. If the object is being worn or carried by a creature, the creature can make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw to avoid the rust monster's touch.

If the object touched is either metal armor or a metal shield being worn or carried, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed. If the object touched is a held metal weapon, it rusts as described in the Rust Metal trait.

action.name: Disrupt Magic {@recharge 5}
entries: The rust monster temporarily disrupts the magic of a magic item within 5 feet. For the next minute, the item's magic is supressed, and the item behaves as if it were nonmagical.

trait.name: Iron Scent
entries: The rust monster can pinpoint, by scent, the location of ferrous metal within 30 feet of it.

trait.name: Rust Metal
entries: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the rust monster corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the rust monster is destroyed after dealing damage.

trait.name: Oxide Armor
entries: Whenever the Rust Monster takes acid or lightning damage, its AC is reduced by 2, until the end of its next turn. Whenever the Rust Monster takes fire damage, its AC is improved by 2 until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Antennae
entries: The rust monster corrodes a nonmagical ferrous metal object it can see within 5 feet of it. If the object isn't being worn or carried, the touch destroys a 1-foot cube of it. If the object is being worn or carried by a creature, the creature can make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw to avoid the rust monster's touch.

If the object touched is either metal armor or a metal shield being worn or carried, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed. If the object touched is a held metal weapon, it rusts as described in the Rust Metal trait.

trait.name: Poor Turner
entries: The roving mauler must move at least 20 feet in a straight line before turning unless it hits a solid surface. It cannot make turns sharper than 45 degrees.

trait.name: Surprising Speed
entries: The roving mauler has +5 AC against attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Trampling Roll
entries: If the roving mauler moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the mauler make up to two additional claw attacks against it and move through its space. If a creature succeeds on this save, the roving mauler's speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its turn.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the roper remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal cave formation, such as a stalagmite.

trait.name: Grasping Tendrils
entries: The urophion can have up to six tendrils at a time. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the urophion, which can extrude a replacement tendril on its next turn. A tendril can also be broken as an action with a successful {@dc 15} Strength check.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The roper can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Stony Flesh
entries: The roper has resistance to nonmagical piercing damage from ranged weapons.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The roper makes six attacks, up to one of which may be a Bite or a Wrench.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) piercing damage. This attack is made with advantage against a {@condition grappled} creature. On a critical hit, the target is {@condition frightened} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Numbing Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 50 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until the grapple ends, the target suffers a {@dice 1d6} penalty to Dexterity for each tendril attached to it, and the roper can't use the same tendril on another target. If a creature reaches 0 Dexterity in this way, they are {@condition paralyzed} and their skin takes on a stony grey palor until they are freed.

action.name: Wrench
entries: The roper attempts to wrench a creature. One creature {@condition grappled} by at least two tendrils must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 8d6} bludgeoning damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a success. If a creature passes this save by 5 or more, it takes no damage and escapes the grapple.

action.name: Whipping Reel
entries: Each creature {@condition grappled} by the Roper may choose to make either a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw, or a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, automatically failing the saving throw they did not choose. If the Strength saving throw is failed, the Roper moves the {@condition grappled} creature 30 feet in a direction of its choosing to a space within range, or 15 feet on a success. If the Dexterity save is failed, the creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage, or half damage and the creature escapes the grapple on a success.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the roper remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal cave formation, such as a stalagmite.

trait.name: Grasping Tendrils
entries: The urophion can have up to six tendrils at a time. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the urophion, which can extrude a replacement tendril on its next turn. A tendril can also be broken as an action with a successful {@dc 15} Strength check.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The roper can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Stony Flesh
entries: The roper has resistance to nonmagical piercing damage from ranged weapons.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The roper makes six attacks, up to one of which may be a Bite or a Wrench.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) piercing damage. This attack is made with advantage against a {@condition grappled} creature. On a critical hit, the target is {@condition frightened} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 50 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until the grapple ends, the roper can't use the same tendril on another target.

action.name: Wrench
entries: The roper attempts to wrench a creature. One creature {@condition grappled} by at least two tendrils must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 8d6} bludgeoning damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a success. If a creature passes this save by 5 or more, it takes no damage and escapes the grapple.

action.name: Reel
entries: The roper pulls each creature {@condition grappled} by it up to 25 feet straight toward it.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The roc has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Gargantuan Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the roc may spend half of its movement to attempt a {@dc 17} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the roc. While climbing on the roc, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the roc, and the roc can't make melee attacks against it. A creature that isn't {@condition prone} may attempt this check as a reaction in place of an attack of opportunity.

trait.name: Implacable
entries: If the roc fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. If it does, it loses 25 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The roc makes two attacks: one with its talons and one with either its beak or its shake off ability.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d6 + 9}) slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the roc can't use its talons on another target.

action.name: Shake Off
entries: Each creature climbing on the Roc must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or lose its grip and fall. The roc may then make a talon attack to catch a creature that failed this save as it falls.

action.name: Wing Attack {@recharge 5}
entries: The roc beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the roc that isn't climbing on it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 37 ({@damage 8d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The roc can then fly up to half its flying speed.

reaction.name: Defiant Scream
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 124 HP, the Roc lets out a mighty screech. Each creature within 60 feet must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the Roc's next turn.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the remorhaz or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The remorhaz can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the Remoraz. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the remorhaz, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the remorhaz's turns.

If the remorhaz takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the remorhaz must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the remorhaz. If the remorhaz dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Terror From the Deep {@recharge 5}
entries: The Remorhaz moves up to its burrow speed, then bursts from underground thrashing in a flurry of debris. Each creature in a 15 foot radius must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half damage on a success. As a bonus action, the remorhaz may make a bite attack against a creature that failed this save.

reaction.name: Inner Fire
entries: As a reaction to failing a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, the remorhaz may choose to succeed. If it does, it takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) fire damage that bypasses its immunity. A creature swalllowed by the remorhaz takes half this damage.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the remorhaz or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}40 ({@damage 6d10 + 7}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the remorhaz can't bite another target.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The remorhaz makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the remorhaz, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the remorhaz's turns.

If the remorhaz takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the remorhaz must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the remorhaz. If the remorhaz dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Terror From the Deep (1/Day)
entries: The Remorhaz moves up to its burrow speed, then bursts from underground thrashing in a flurry of debris. Each creature in a 15 foot radius must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half damage on a success.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the remorhaz or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Terror From the Deep (1/Day)
entries: The Remorhaz moves up to its burrow speed, then bursts from underground thrashing in a flurry of debris. Each creature in a 10 foot radius must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half damage on a success.

resist.special: weapon attacks not made from inside it

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Earth Quaker
entries: When the worm burrows 30 feet or fewer below the surface, 10 foot wide, 10 foot deep fissures open at the surface above where it passes. Creatures in the space where a fissure opens must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone} in the trench. On a success, a creature may use its reaction to move up to 10 feet to avoid falling in.

trait.name: Implacable
entries: If the worm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. If it does, it loses 25 hit points.

trait.name: Shock Sensitivity
entries: If the worm, or the ground within 30 feet of it is subjected to lightning damage, it cannot use its terror from the deep action on its next turn, and must use all of its movement to surface.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The worm makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.

If the worm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the worm. If the worm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tail Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Terror From the Deep {@recharge 5}
entries: The Worm moves up to its burrow speed, then bursts from underground thrashing in a flurry of debris. Each creature in a 15 foot radius must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half damage on a success. As a bonus action, the worm may make a bite attack against a creature that failed this save.

reaction.name: Dweomersense
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a spell of 4th level or above, the purple worm may move up to its burrow speed. If it is no longer a valid target for the spell, the spell slot is not expended and the spell caster may choose a different use for their action.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spider makes one attack with its bite and two attacks with its legs, one of which it may replace with its deadly leap, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute.

While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target shifts from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Legs
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hits: 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). If this attack was made at advantage, the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Deadly Leap {@recharge 5}
entries: If the spider jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the spider's space into the nearest unoccupied space.

bonus.name: Bind
entries: The spider may use its webbing to restrain a  {@condition prone} target (escape {@dc 14}). If the target is Medium or smaller, the spider may then attach the creature to its back as part of this action.

bonus.name: Ethereal Jaunt
entries: As a bonus action, the spider can magically shift from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa. It gains advantage on the next attack it makes this turn. {@condition grappled} and carried creatures do not shift with it.

reaction.name: Gone In A Blink
entries: As a reaction to taking 10 or more damage, the spider may use its Ethereal Jaunt ability.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spider makes one attack with its legs, and one with its bite.

action.name: Legs
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hits: 9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled}. If this attack was made at advantage, the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute.

While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target shifts from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

bonus.name: Bind
entries: The spider may use its webbing to restrain a  {@condition prone} target (escape {@dc 12}). If the target is Medium or smaller, the spider may then attach the creature to its back as part of this action.

bonus.name: Ethereal Jaunt
entries: As a bonus action, the spider can magically shift from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa. It gains advantage on the first attack it makes this turn. {@condition grappled} and carried creatures do not shift with it.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the piercer remains motionless on the ceiling, it is indistinguishable from a normal stalactite.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The piercer can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Drop
entries: One creature directly underneath the piercer must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage per 10 feet fallen, up to 21 ({@dice 6d6}), and have the piercer embed itself in the  wound. A surprised creature makes this save at disadvantage. The piercer may be removed as an action with a successful {@dc 10} Strength (Athletics) check.

action.name: Digest
entries: One creature the piercer is embedded in must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) acid damage and be {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Thrash
entries: As a reaction to a creature attempting to remove it from a wound, the piercer thrashes. The creature it is embedded in must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the piercer's next turn.

monster.name: Peryton
languages: understands Common and Elvish but can't speak

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the peryton is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack scores a critical on an 18, 19, or 20.

trait.name: Horrific Critical
entries: If the Peryton reduces a humanoid creature to 0 HP with a critical hit, it may make a gore attack against the same target as a bonus action. On a hit, the Peryton tears out the victims heart with its teeth. Each creature within 30 feet that sees this must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the Peryton's next turn.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The peryton doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The peryton has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The peryton makes one gore attack and one talon attack.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shadow Mark
entries: One creature within 300 feet that the Peryton's shadow passed over this turn must make a {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw or be cursed for the next minute. Whenever the creature takes damage from one of the peryton's attacks, it must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The owlbear makes two claw attacks. It may replace one of them with a beak attack. If both claw atacks hit the same target, it is knocked {@condition prone} and can't stand on its next turn.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage. This attack does an additional 5 ({@damage 1d10}) damage to a {@condition prone} creature.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage and the target must make a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be pushed back 5 feet.

reaction.name: Roaring Screech
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 30 HP, the owlbear lets out an ear-piercing screech. Each creature within 10 ft. of the Owlbear must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be disoriented, making attacks at disadvantage until the end of its next turn. Additionally, a creature that fail this save falls {@condition prone} if it misses with a melee attack on its next turn.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it dies, the naga returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only a {@spell wish} spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

action.name: Beguiling Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 31 ({@damage 7d8}) poison damage and be {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn, or half as much damage on a successful one. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, a creature is {@condition charmed} and follows the mental commands of the naga.

action.name: Lightning Bolt
entries: A bolt of lightning 100 ft. long and 5 ft. wide extends from the naga. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) lightning damage, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Mana Drain {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw or have its highest level unexpended spell slot expended. If the naga expends a spell slot of 3rd level or above in this way, the next time it uses its lightning bolt it deals maximum damage, instead of rolling.

reaction.name: Shunt Pain
entries: As a reaction when a creature hits it with an attack and a {@condition charmed} creature is within 10 feet, the naga gains resistance to the attacks damage types until the beginning of its next turn, and the {@condition charmed} creature takes the same amount of damage as psychic damage.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it dies, the naga returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only a {@spell wish} spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

action.name: Discorporating Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage and 45 ({@damage 10d8}) poison damage. The target must then succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or become partly incorporeal, dealing half as much damage with weapon attacks that use Strength or Dexterity. A creature may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Spit Venom
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15/30 ft., one creature. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d8}) poison damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or gain vulnerability to the next source of poison damage it is subjected to in the next minute.

action.name: Searing Tide {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within 60 must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Spell effects of 5th level or below in the affected area are dispelled.

reaction.name: Banishing Retort
entries: As a reaction to taking 20 or more damage from a single attack or spell, the naga may force the attacker to make a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or be banished to a harmless demiplane and {@condition incapacitated} for one minute. An affected creature repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Fear Eater
entries: The naga scores a critical hit on a roll of 15-20 on attacks made against a creature that is {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Cursed Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. While cursed, the creature has disadvantage on Wisdom saves to resist fear effects. A cursed creature may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

reaction.name: Death Rattle
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee weapon attack, the naga lets loose an echoing rattle that causes living creatures to reflect on their own mortality. Each non-undead creature within 5 feet of the naga must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the naga's next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

trait.name: Molten Body
entries: If the spider takes any cold damage, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition petrified}. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the spider melts and warps. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spider makes one attack with its legs and one with its bite.

action.name: Legs
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hits: 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled}. If this attack was made at advantage, the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) piercing damage and the target catches fire. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the end of each of its turns.

action.name: Molten Web {@recharge 5}
entries: The spider launches webbing in a 10 foot radius within 60 feet. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by webbing (Escape {@dc 12}) until the end of its next turn. A creature wearing metal armor that ends its turn {@condition restrained} by the webbing takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage and takes a permanant and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC its armor offers. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; HP 10; vulnerability to cold damage).

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the minotaur moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

trait.name: Reckless Follow-Through
entries: At the start of its turn, the minotaur can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn. If it misses with an attack this turn, it is {@condition stunned} until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Ferocity
entries: When the minotaur is reduced to 0 HP, it may use its multiattack before falling {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistances (3/Day)
entries: If the minotaur fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The minotaur makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with Baphomet's Rage.

action.name: Cleaving Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) slashing damage. If this damage reduces a creature to 0 Hit Points, any excess damage can be applied to another creature within reach that has an AC equal to or below the initial attack roll.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Baphomet's Rage
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that the minotaur can see must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must use its reaction to move up to 20 feet in a direction of the minotaur's choice. If it ends this movement within 5 ft. of one or more creatures, it must make a melee attack against one of them.

action.name: Thrashing Horns {@recharge 5}
entries: Two creatures on opposite sides of the minotaur must each succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 8d8}) piercing damage and be pushed 10 feet away, or take half as much damage on a success.

reaction.name: Gouging Toss
entries: As a reaction to a creature moving within 5 ft. of it, the minotaur forces the creature to succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage and be  knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Phantasmal Labyrinth (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 120 hit points, the minotaur raises an illusory labyrinth in a 100 ft. radius around itself that seems in all respects real, obscures vision beyond 10 ft., and lasts for 1 minute. A creature that starts its turn in the area must succeed on a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw or have its movement controlled by the minotaur this turn.

A creature that succeeds by 5 or more becomes immune to the effects of this labyrinth. A creature that marks its path with breadcrumbs, yarn, or something similar gains advantage on this saving throw.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the minotaur moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage.
