entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Silken Noose {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The creature is {@condition restrained} by webbing (escape {@dc 11}). While {@condition restrained} in this way, the ettercap may drag the {@condition restrained} creature 15 feet toward it at the beginning of each of the ettercap's turns.

trait.name: Spiderlike
entries: The drider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty. While in contact with a web, the drider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Lurker in the Dark
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the drider has advantage on all attacks, and scores a critical hit on a roll of 19-20.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The drider makes three attacks in any combination with its Bite, Silkblade, and Longbow. It may replace one of those attacks with a use of its Douse ability, if available..

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Silkblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage. On a critical hit, the target is magically {@condition restrained} by webbing if it is a medium or smaller creature (escape {@dc 14}).

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Douse {@recharge 5}
entries: The drider magically douses all lights in a 20 foot radius centered on a point within 60 feet. If the drider is hidden, this action does not reveal its position.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The doppelganger can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The doppelganger has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

trait.name: Exploit Weakness
entries: Attack rolls the doppelganger makes with advantage deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage.

trait.name: Mind Reader
entries: The doppelganger can magically read the surface thoughts of  creatures within 60 feet of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The doppelganger makes two slam attacks and uses its perfect replica ability.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Perfect Replica
entries: A creature within 5 feet of the doppelganger must make a {@dc 15} Constitution Saving Throw. On a failure, the creature is {@condition stunned} until the end of the doppelganger's next turn, and the doppleganger takes on its appearance. While the doppelganger is adjacent to a {@condition stunned} creature whose appearance it is mimicking, attack rolls directed at it have a 50% chance of hitting the copied creature instead. A creature that fails this save becomes immune to the effect for 24 hours.

action.name: Cloud Mind (concentration)
entries: The doppelganger becomes {@condition invisible} to creatures within 15 feet of it for the next hour, or until it makes an attack or casts a spell.

reaction.name: Uncanny Mimicry
entries: As a reaction to seeing a creature taking an action, the doppleganger may memorize that action. On its next turn, it may take that action. If the action included a weapon, the doppleganger grows an appendage to mimic it. If the action was to cast a spell, the doppleganger can cast it innately without a spell slot, using the mimicked creature's attack bonus and save DC.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The doppelganger can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The doppelganger has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the doppelganger surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage from the attack.

trait.name: Mind Reader
entries: The doppelganger can magically read the surface thoughts of  creatures within 60 feet of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The doppelganger makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Uncanny Mimicry
entries: As a reaction to seeing a creature taking an action, the doppelganger may memorize that action. On its next turn, it may take that action. If the action included a weapon, the doppelganger grows an appendage to mimic it. If the action was to cast a spell, the doppelganger cast it innately without a spell slot, using the mimicked creature's attack bonus and save DC.

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The dolgrim has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Double Actions
entries: The dolgrim rolls initiative twice, and acts on each of them.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The dolgrim can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Flail {@recharge}
entries: The dolgrim makes three weapon attacks at disadvantage.

reaction.name: Slippery
entries: If an attack misses the dolgrim, it can move up to 5 feet as a reaction without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the displacer beast is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails .

trait.name: Displacement
entries: The displacer beast projects a magical illusion that makes it appear to be standing near its actual location, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted until the end of its next turn. This trait is also disrupted while the displacer beast is {@condition incapacitated} or has a speed of 0.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: When in dim light or darkness, the displacer beast can hide as a bonus action

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the displacer beast moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw Attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the displacer beast can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The displacer beast makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}).

reaction.name: Slink
entries: As a reaction to a creature ending its movement within 5 feet of the displacer beast, it may move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

reaction.name: Slam
entries: As a reaction to a creature it has {@condition grappled} hitting it with an attack the displacer beast may lift it into the air and slam it to the ground. The creature must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the displacer beast's next turn.

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the displacer beast is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails .

trait.name: Displacement
entries: The displacer beast projects a magical illusion that makes it appear to be standing near its actual location, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted until the end of its next turn. This trait is also disrupted while the displacer beast is {@condition incapacitated} or has a speed of 0.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: When in dim light or darkness, the displacer beast can hide as a bonus action

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the displacer beast moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw Attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the displacer beast can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The displacer beast makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}).

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The darkmantle can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the darkmantle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a cave formation such as a stalactite or stalagmite.

action.name: Crush
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). While {@condition grappled}, the target is {@condition blinded} and can't breathe breathe, and the darkmantle has advantage on attacks against it and cannot bite another target. If this attack was made with advantage, the creature loses its breath if it was holding it.

reaction.name: Darkness Aura (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to taking damage, the darkmantle exhudes a 15-foot radius of magical darkness that moves with it, and spreads around corners. The darkness lasts until the next time the darkmantle takes damage.

trait.name: Nondetection
entries: The cat cannot be targeted or detected by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

trait.name: Righting Reflex
entries: The cat takes no fall damage if it falls from a height of 30 ft. or greater.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the cat moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the cat can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The cat has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Spell Turning
entries: As a reaction to succeeding on a saving throw against a spell of 7th level or lower that targets only it, the cat avoids all effects from the spell and instead causes the spell to target the caster.

reaction.name: Bat Away
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the cat forces the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or have one object it is holding knocked out of its hands and 15 ft. away.

trait.name: Clumsy Flier
entries: The cockatrice falls at the end of a turn if it's airborne and the only thing holding it aloft is its flying speed. Attacks it makes while airborne are made at disadvantage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw against being magically {@condition petrified}. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained} until the end of the cockatrice's next turn. If the target was already {@condition restrained} in this way, on a failed save it is instead {@condition petrified} for 24 hours.

reaction.name: Buffetting Wings
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the cockatrice may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The cockatrice may then move up to half its speed as part of this reaction.

trait.name: Three Heads
entries: The chimera has three reactions each round. Whenever it takes 20 or more damage from a single source it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or lose one of its reactions.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the chimera fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chimera makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws. When its fire breath is available, it can use the breath in place of its bite.

action.name: Gnashing Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon head exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Headbutt
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the chimera may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the chimera's next turn.

reaction.name: Rake
entries: As a reaction to a creature entering its reach, the chimera may make a claws attack against it. If the attack hits, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Roar
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a ranged attack, the chimera may let out a terrifying roar. Each creature within 60 feet that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the chimera until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: The chimera makes a claw attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The chimera beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the chimera must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

monster.name: Chimera
languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

trait.name: Three Heads
entries: The chimera has three reactions each round. Whenever it takes 20 or more damage from a single source it must make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or lose one of its reactions.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chimera makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws. When its fire breath is available, it can use the breath in place of its bite.

action.name: Gnashing Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon head exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 7d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Headbutt
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the chimera may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or  take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the chimera's next turn.

reaction.name: Rake
entries: As a reaction to a creature entering its reach, the chimera may make a claws attack against it.

reaction.name: Roar
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a ranged attack, the chimera may let out a terrifying roar. Each creature within 60 feet that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the chimera until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Flammable Blood
entries: If the cave fisher takes fire damage while below 30 hit points, it catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns, and deals an additonal 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage with its melee attacks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cave fisher makes two melee attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hits: 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A {@condition poisoned} creature repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Adhesive Filament
entries: The cave fisher extrudes a sticky filament up to 60 ft. A creature that touches this filament is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). The filament can be attacked (AC 15; 5 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage), but a weapon that fails to sever it becomes stuck to it, requiring an action and a successful {@dc 13} Strength check to pull free. Destroying the filament causes no damage to the cave fisher, which can extrude a replacement filament on its next turn.

action.name: Reel
entries: One Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the cave fisher's filament becomes {@condition restrained}  must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 60 ft. toward the cave fisher.

reaction.name: Angler's Set
entries: As a reaction to a creature becoming {@condition grappled} by or failing an attempt to escape its filament, the cave fisher uses its Reel.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a catoblepas that starts its turn within 10 feet of the catoblepas must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of any catoblepas for 1 hour.

trait.name: Harbinger of Tragedy
entries: A creature that sees a catoblepas must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or be Cursed, becoming immmune to this curse for the next 24 hours on a success. A creature cursed in this way dies after two failed death saves, rather than three.

trait.name: Inevitable Call
entries: Each creature within 100 ft. that does not have all of its hit points is dragged 15 ft. toward the catoblepas at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Catoblepas makes two melee attacks, one of which it may replace with a use of its Final Glance, if available.

action.name: Whipneck Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 5d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed 10 ft. away.

action.name: Tail Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 5d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is unable to stand or swim for the next minute.

action.name: Final Glance {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or suffer vulnerability to all damage for the next minute. A creature that fails this saving throw by 5 or more instead suffers vulnerability to all damage until it completes a long rest.

reaction.name: Withering Gaze (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 82 hit points, the catoblepas forces one creature it can see within 30 feet to make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The target dies if reduced to 0 hit points by this ray.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a catoblepas that starts its turn within 10 feet of the catoblepas must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of any catoblepas for 1 hour.

trait.name: Harbinger of Tragedy
entries: A creature that sees a catoblepas must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or be Cursed, becoming immmune to this curse for the next 24 hours on a success. A creature cursed in this way dies after two failed death saves, rather than three.

action.name: Whipneck Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 5d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed 10 ft. away.

action.name: Tail Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is unable to stand or swim for the next minute.

action.name: Final Glance {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or suffer vulnerability to all damage for the next minute. A creature that fails this saving throw by 5 or more instead suffers vulnerability to all damage until it completes a long rest.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The carrion crawler has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The carrion crawler can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Consume
entries: If the carrion crawler has a creature {@condition grappled}, the carrion crawler can make a predigest attack as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The carrion crawler makes two attacks with its tentacles.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) poison damage, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the carrion crawler can't use its tentacles against another target.

action.name: Predigest
entries: One {@condition grappled} creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, attackers score a critical hit against the {@condition poisoned} creature on a roll of 11-20. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the poison on itself on a success.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Bite Down
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack by a creature it does not have {@condition grappled}, the carrion crawler makes a bite attack against a creature it has {@condition grappled}.

trait.name: Calming Presence
entries: Each creature within 5 ft. of the carbuncle has advantage on saving throws to maintain concentration or to resist an effect that would Frighten it.

trait.name: Head Gem
entries: The carbuncle has a worthless translucent horny growth in its forehead that resembles a large ruby or garnet. A creature that pries it off with a successful {@dc 15} Strength (Athletics) check must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constititution saving throw or contract {@disease leprosy|ConfC}.

action.name: Disarming Lick
entries: One creature within 5 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the carbuncle until the end of its next turn, or until the creature is hit with an attack. Attack rolls against a creature {@condition charmed} in this way are made at advantage.

reaction.name: End Life
entries: As a reaction to a creature targeting the carbuncle with an attack or harmful spell, the carbuncle keels over and dies. The attacker may choose a new target.

reaction.name: Feign Death
entries: As a reaction to a creature targeting the carbuncle with an attack or harmful spell, the carbuncle keels over and appears to die. A creature may attempt a {@dc 13} Wisdom (Medicine) or Wisdom Insight check as a Bonus Action to determine it is faking. The attacker may choose a new target.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bulette's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Blood Sense
entries: The bulette knows the exact location of every creature within 120 feet that does not have all of its hit points.

trait.name: Shock Attack
entries: If the bulette starts its turn underground, other creatures may not take reactions on its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bulette attacks once with its bite and uses its lateral rend.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d12 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the bulette can't bite another target.

action.name: Lateral Rend
entries: A creature the bulette has {@condition grappled} must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 6d6} slashing damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the bulette's next turn, or half as much damage on a failure.

action.name: Deadly Leap
entries: If the bulette jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) slashing damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the bulette's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the bulette's space.

action.name: Erupt {@recharge 5}
entries: The Bulette moves up to its burrow speed, then bursts from underground thrashing in a flurry of debris. Each creature in a 10 foot radius must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half damage on a success. The bulette may make a bite attack as a bonus action against a creature that failed this save.

reaction.name: Dweomersense
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a spell of 4th level or above, the bulette may move up to its burrow speed. If it is no longer a valid target for the spell, the spell slot is not expended and the spell caster may choose a different use for their action.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bulette's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Blood Sense
entries: The bulette knows the exact location of every creature within 120 feet that does not have all of its hit points.

trait.name: Shock Attack
entries: If the bulette starts its turn underground, other creatures may not take reactions on its turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d12 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Deadly Leap (1/Day)
entries: If the bulette jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) slashing damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the bulette's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the bulette's space.

action.name: Erupt {@recharge 5}
entries: The Bulette moves up to its burrow speed, then bursts from underground thrashing in a flurry of debris. Each creature in a 10 foot radius must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half damage on a success. The bulette may make a bite attack as a bonus action against a creature that failed this save.

trait.name: Lighting Reflexes
entries: The behir does not roll initiative. Instead, it takes its turn on both initiative count 20 and initiative count 10.

trait.name: Sparking Wounds
entries: If the behir has fewer than 84 HP, each creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of it takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage.

trait.name: Huge Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the behir may spend half of its movement to attempt a {@dc 14} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the behir. While climbing on the giant, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the behir.

trait.name: Restless
entries: If the behir ends its turn without moving at least 25 feet, attacks against it are made at advantage until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) slashing damage. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}) if the behir isn't already constricting a creature, and the target is {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge}
entries: The behir exhales a line of lightning that is 20 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The behir makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the behir, it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the behir's turns, and its attacks bypass the behir's resistances. A behir can have only one creature swallowed at a time.

If the behir takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the behir must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the behir. If the behir dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Ossifying Gaze
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the basilisk that can see it (or its reflection) must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained} until the beginning of its next turn.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the basilisk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

action.name: Stonecrushing Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Petrify
entries: One creature affected by the basilisk's ossifying gaze must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition petrified} for the next 24 hours. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is {@condition petrified} until cured with a Greater Restoration or similar magic.

reaction.name: Darting Snap
entries: As a reaction to a creature that is averting its eyes missing the basilisk with a melee attack, the basilisk may make a bite attack against the attacker.

trait.name: Wilting Gaze
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the basilisk that can see it (or its reflection) must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength or Dexterity.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the basilisk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Wither
entries: One creature affected by the basilisk's wilting gaze must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) necrotic damage. If this reduces the creature to 0 HP, it makes death saves at disadvantage for the next minute.

reaction.name: Darting Snap
entries: As a reaction to a creature that is averting its eyes missing the basilisk with a melee attack, the basilisk may make a bite attack against the attacker.

monster.name: Banderhobb Abductor
languages: Common and the languages of its creator but cant speak

trait.name: Resonant Connection
entries: If the banderhobb has even a tiny piece of a creature or an object in its possession, such as a lock of hair or a splinter of wood, it knows the most direct route to that creature or object if it is within 1 mile of the banderhobb.

trait.name: Shadow Diver
entries: The banderhobb treats areas of dim light or darkness as arbitrarily deep, interconnected pools of water. It can be faintly seen and targeted while submerged in these shadow-pools, though other creatures cannot ordinarily pass into them unless carried by a banderhobb.

trait.name: Extradimensional Gullet
entries: Creatures swallowed by the banderhobb are teleported to a demiplane roughly 10 ft. in diameter with walls that appear to be covered in giant humanoid faces made of the banderhob's flesh; it has following attributes:
A creature that starts its turn in the demiplane takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage.

The walls of the demiplane have AC 20 and 30 hit points. If ruptured, each creature in the demiplane appears within 10 ft. of the banderhob. If the banderhobb is submerged in a shadow pool, the creatures appear at the surface of the nearest entrance.
If ruptured, the banderhobb's gullet is restored on a short or long rest.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 5d6 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC: 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the banderhobb can't use its bite attack or tongue attack on another target.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage, and the target must make a DC: 15 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is pulled to a space within 5 feet of the banderhobb, which can use a bonus action to make a bite attack against the target.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The banderhobb makes a bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed creature is teleported to the banderhobb's extradimensional gullet.

monster.name: Banderhobb Filch
languages: Common and the languages of its creator but cant speak

trait.name: Resonant Connection
entries: If the banderhobb has even a tiny piece of a creature or an object in its possession, such as a lock of hair or a splinter of wood, it knows the most direct route to that creature or object if it is within 1 mile of the banderhobb.

trait.name: Shadow Diver
entries: The banderhobb treats areas of dim light or darkness as arbitrarily deep, interconnected pools of water. It can be faintly seen and targeted while submerged in these shadow-pools, though other creatures cannot ordinarily pass into them unless carried by a banderhobb.

trait.name: Shadow Squeezer
entries: As a bonus action, the banderhobb may attempt a {@dc 13} Strength (Athletics) check to squeeze through a shadow between 1 inch and 2 ft. in diameter, using its Shadow Diver trait. If it fails by fewer than 5, it is still able to squeeze through, but leaves its People Sack behind.

trait.name: People Sack
entries: The banderhobb carries a magical burlap sack with the following properties:
The sack is an extradimensional space that can hold up to 4 Medium creatures. The weight and appearance of the sack are not affected by the creatures in it.
A creature that starts its turn in the sack must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or fall asleep until a creature takes an action to wake it.

The sack has AC 15, 20 hit points, and vulnerability to slashing damage. If ruptured, each creature in the sack appears within 5 ft. of the banderhobb. If the banderhobb is submerged in a shadow pool, the creatures appear at the surface of the nearest entrance.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The banderhobb makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Into the Sack!
entries: One creature the banderhobb is grappling or hidden from must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be thrown into the banderhobb's People Sack.

trait.name: Brittle Exoskeleton
entries: If the ankheg takes 10 or more bludgeoning damage from a single source, its AC is reduced to 11 until it completes a short or long rest.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the ankheg can bite only the {@condition grappled} creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge}
entries: The ankheg spits acid in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide, provided that it has no creature {@condition grappled}. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Vitriol (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to taking 10 or more fire damage, the ankheg immediately recharges its Acid Spray.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The werewolf can use a bonus action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its humanoid form if it dies.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Cursed Resilience
entries: When the werewolf is reduced to 0 HP, it does not die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, it loses the ability to take actions other than to dash. If it takes damage from a silvered weapon while at 0 HP, it is killed.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pack leader has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Pack Leader
entries: Other werewolves have advantage on attacks against creatures adjacent to the pack leader.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The werewolf makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dread Howl
entries: The pack leader emits a keening howl in a 30-foot radius. Each creature in that area that isn't {@condition deafened} must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the pack leaders next turn. While a creature is {@condition frightened} in this way, it must take the Dash action and move away from the pack leader by the safest available route on its turn, unless there is nowhere to move.

reaction.name: Rapid Retaliation
entries: As a reaction to being struck with a ranged attack, the pack leader may move up to half its speed. If it ends this move adjacent to the attacker, it may make a bite attack.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its humanoid form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The werebear has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Concussive Strength
entries: A creature knocked {@condition prone} by the bear must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be unable to stand on its following turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The werebear makes three attacks with its claws and one with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werebear lycanthropy.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) slashing damage and the target suffers one additional effect of the werebear's choice.
The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}) and {@condition restrained} if it is a medium or smaller creature.
The target must succeeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be shoved up to 15 ft. away and knocked {@condition prone}.
The target must succeeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or have one item it is holding knocked out of its grip and flung 15 ft. away.
The target takes an additonal 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.
The target has imperceptible vibrations reverberate through its body for the next hour, which are harmless until activated.

reaction.name: Quivering Palm
entries: As a reaction to a creature reducing it below 126 HP, the werebear sends shockwaves rippling through a creature affected by its claw vibrations. The creature must succceed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or die as its heart stops. On a successful save, the target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage and is {@condition stunned} until the end of the werebear's next turn.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The jackalwere can use its action to polymorph into a specific Medium human or a jackal-humanoid hybrid, or back into its true form (that of a Small jackal). Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The jackalwere has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The jackalwere has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the jackalwere's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sleep Gaze
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of one or more jackalweres that can see it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw or fall asleep for the next minute. A creature wakes early if it takes damage, or if another creature uses its action to wake it.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the jackalwere until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Vicious Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage. On a critical hit, this attack deals an additional 7 damage.

monster.name: The Sun That Empties Hell, Anathema Ascendant

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The anathema has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Blessed and Chosen
entries: When the anathema dies, its six heads each tear away from the body and immediately travel 15 feet. They act on the anathema's initiative, have AC 17 and 1 HP, and can't take actions other than to dash. If any remain alive after 24 hours, one reforms into a new body for the anathema, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again.

trait.name: Ascended Soul (Mythic Trait, recharges after a Short or Long rest)
entries: When the anathema is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, it gains 189 temp HP and sprouts wings of light, gaining an 80 foot fly speed, a fourth legendary action each round, and it immediately regains all spent legendary actions.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The anathema makes two claw attacks, one constrict attack, and one Flurry of Bites attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and takes 16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage at the start of each of its turns, and the anathema can't constrict another target.

action.name: Flurry of Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Drain Essence {@recharge 5}
entries: One target creature within 10 feet must make a DC17 Constitution Saving Throw. On a failed save, the target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage, or half as much on a success. If the target is reduced to 0 HP, they also have their constitution score reduced by {@dice 3d6}. If the target is a Yuan Ti, it makes the saving throw with disadvantage.

action.name: Compel Submission (1/Day)
entries: Each creature within 30 feet must make a DC17 Wisdom Save or be {@condition charmed} and compelled to kneel before the anathema. This effect ends if the anathema takes any hostile action toward a {@condition charmed} creature or or someone uses an action to shake the {@condition charmed} creature out of its stupor.

reaction.name: Divine Backlash
entries: When the anathema passes a saving throw against a magical effect, it may use its reaction to deal 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage to the spellcaster.

legendary.name: Claw (1 Action):
entries: Xibalbabalaam moves up to half his speed and makes a claw attack.

legendary.name: Secrete Acid
entries: Xibalbabalaam coats himself in acid. The next creature to start its turn {@condition grappled} by the anathema must make a {@dc 19} Constitution Saving Throw or suffer vulnerability to the next source of radiant damage it takes.

legendary.name: Burst with Light (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 30 feet must make a {@dc 19} Constitution Saving Throw or be take {@damage 4d8} radiant damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn. A {@condition grappled} creature has disadvantage on this save.

legendary.name: Solar Flare (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature in a 5 foot wide, 60 foot long line must make a {@dc 19} Constitution Saving Throw or suffer {@damage 5d8} radiant damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn, or half as much on a success.

mythicHeader: If the anathema's mythic trait is active, it may use the options below as legendary actions for one hour after using its ascended soul ability.

mythic.name: Divine Utterance (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each creature of the anathema's choice that can hear it must make a {@dc 19} Charisma save or be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition deafened} for one minute. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is also {@condition blinded} and {@condition frightened} for the next minute. A creature that fails this save by 10 or more also drops to 0 HP.

mythic.name: Breath of Dawn (Costs 4 Actions)
entries: Six 5 foot wide, 60 foot long lines emanate from the anathema. Each creature in at least one of them must make a {@dc 19} Constitution Saving Throw or suffer 42 ({@damage 12d6}) radiant damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn, or half as much on a success.

A creature has advantage on this save if the yuan-ti has a creature {@condition grappled} with its Constrict ability.

reaction.name: Crush
entries: As a reaction to a creature the yuan-ti has {@condition grappled} with its Constrict ability speaking or casting a spell with a verbal component, the yuan-ti crushes the air out of its lungs. The creature immediately begins to suffocate.

entries: While in sunlight, the yuan-ti adds {@dice 1d4} to the result of any attack roll or Charisma check it makes.

trait.name: Magic Resistance

trait.name: Serpent's Glory
entries: Friendly yuan-ti within 30 feet of the Pit Master may use its attack bonus, rather than their own.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yuan-ti attacks once with its Flurry of Bites and uses its Sinuous Command. If it has fewer than 69 hit points, it may instead attack twice with its Flurry of Bites.

action.name: Flurry of Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Sinuous Command
entries: One friendly yuan-ti may use its reaction to move up to half its speed and take an action. If it does, it can't take actions on its following turn, other than to disengage.

reaction.name: Embrace the Swarm
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 69 hit points, the yuan-ti transforms into a swarm of venemous snakes. Its statistics remain the same, except it can occupy another creature's space and it has resistance to blugeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

trait.name: Blessed by the Sun
entries: While in sunlight, the yuan-ti adds {@dice 1d4} to the result of any attack roll or Charisma check it makes.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Fed by Terror
entries: At the beginning of its turn, if one creature within 60 feet is {@condition frightened} of it, the yuan-ti increases its size to Large. If two or more creatures within 60 feet are {@condition frightened} of it, the yuan-ti instead increases its size to Huge. If no creatures within 60 feet are {@condition frightened} of it, it reverts to its normal size.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yuan-ti makes two melee attacks if it is size Medium, three attacks if it is size Large, and four attacks if it is size Huge, one of which may be with its Bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Invoke Nightmare
entries: The yuan-ti evokes the nightmares of a creature it can see within 60 feet, appearing to that creature as a manifestation of its deepest fears. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage and be {@condition frightened} for the next minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Blessed by the Sun
entries: While in sunlight, the yuan-ti adds {@dice 1d4} to the result of any attack roll or Charisma check it makes.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Envenomed Trance
entries: A {@condition poisoned} creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the yuan-ti is {@condition charmed} by the yuan-ti until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yuan-ti makes two attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Glass Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Atlatl
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Subtle Shift
entries: One creature within 60 feet that is {@condition poisoned} must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's perceives one ally in range as an enemy, or one enemy in range as an ally, for as long as it remains {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Blessed by the Sun
entries: While in sunlight, the yuan-ti adds {@dice 1d4} to the result of any attack roll or Charisma check it makes.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Slither Strike
entries: Other creatures can't take reactions on the yuan-ti's turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yuan-ti makes two attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

reaction.name: Deflect
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a weapon attack, the malison may increase its AC by 4 against the triggering attack.

trait.name: Blessed by the Sun
entries: While in sunlight, the yuan-ti adds {@dice 1d4} to the result of any attack roll or Charisma check it makes.

trait.name: Hooked Teeth
entries: The broodguard can maintain a grapple even while {@condition incapacitated} or dead. A creature that fails an attempt to escape the broodguard's grapple takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The broodguard makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}).

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Gnaw
entries: A creature {@condition grappled} by the broodguard must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more has disadvantage on attack rolls that use Strength until it completes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Blessed by the Sun
entries: While in sunlight, the yuan-ti adds {@dice 1d4} to the result of any attack roll or Charisma check it makes.

trait.name: Cold Reading
entries: The yuan-ti has advantage on Charisma (Deception) checks made to present themselves as a forgotten friendly acquaintance.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yuan-ti makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Chameleon Skin
entries: The troglodyte has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide from creatures more than 30 feet away.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The troglodyte makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage and the target can't benefit from magical healing until the start of the troglodyte's next turn.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the troglodyte can grapple the target (escape {@dc 12}).

trait.name: Camouflage
entries: The thri-kreen is {@condition invisible} to creatures more than 30 feet away from it.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The thri-kreen's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Predatory Grappler
entries: The thri-kreen has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it. If it has a creature {@condition grappled}, it may make a bite attack as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target suffers a critical hit on a roll of 11-20. The {@condition poisoned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the thri-kreen can grapple the target (escape {@dc 11}) and pull the target 5 ft. towards it.

trait.name: Pain Focus
entries: While it has fewer than 103 hit points, the shadar-kai may dash or make a melee attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Creeping Apathy
entries: If the shadar-kai ends its turn without dealing or receiving damage, its AC is reduced by 2 until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Deep Shadow
entries: Areas of dim light or darkness within 15 ft. of the shadar-kai count as difficult terrain for creatures of its choice. Hostile creatures that start their turn in the area, or enter the area for the first time on a turn, must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shadar-kai makes two attacks with its sickle and uses either its Curse of Beshadowed Mind or Curse of the Bloody Tongue.

action.name: Corrupting Blackfire
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage and catch fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns and can't benefit from healing magic.

action.name: Curse of Beshadowed Mind
entries: One creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. While cursed in this way, the range of the creature's darkvision, if it has it, is reduced to 10 ft., and the creature has disadvantage on Dexterity and Wisdom saving throws while in bright light

action.name: Curse of the Bloody Tongue
entries: One creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. While cursed in this way, whenever the creature attempts to speak or cast a spell it must first succeed on a {@dc 16} Consitution saving throw or be unable to speak or breathe this turn.

reaction.name: Snuff
entries: As a reaction to a source of light entering the radius of its Deep Shadow trait, the shadar-kai extinguishes it.

trait.name: Pain Focus
entries: While it has fewer than 96 hit points, the shadar-kai may dash or make a melee attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Creeping Apathy
entries: If the shadar-kai ends its turn without dealing or receiving damage, its AC is reduced by 1 until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Umbral Weapon
entries: The shadar-kai treats its spear as arbitrarily long (up to 120 ft.), as long as the attack doesn't pass through or into any areas of bright light.

trait.name: Armor of Years
entries: A creature that hits the gloom weaver with a melee attack takes 25 necrotic damage and must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or age {@dice 1d4 x 5} years. This trait is then disrupted until the end of its next turn. The aging effect can be reversed with a {@spell greater restoration} spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shadar-kai makes two attacks with its darkspear.

action.name: Darkspear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage and 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be disoriented, making attacks at disadvantage until the end of its next turn. Additionally, a creature that fail this save falls {@condition prone} if it misses with a melee attack on its next turn.

reaction.name: Shadow Juant
entries: As a reaction to taking damage, the shadar-kai magically teleports up to 30 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it teleports from and to must be in dim light or darkness. Until the beginning of its next turn, the shadar-kai has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

trait.name: Pain Focus
entries: While it has fewer than 90 hit points, the shadar-kai may dash or make a melee attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Creeping Apathy
entries: If the shadar-kai ends its turn without dealing or receiving damage, its AC is reduced by 2 until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Veil of Shadows
entries: The shadar-kai is {@condition invisible} while in dim light or darkness.

trait.name: Shadow Weft
entries: A shadar-kai within 30 ft. that hits with a melee attack increases its movement by 5 and doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity until the end of its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shadar-kai makes two attacks with its blade and uses its Gloom Cage, if available.

action.name: Blackened Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) slashing damage and 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} while in Bright Light for the next minute. An affected creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Gloom Cage {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to two creatures within 30 ft. in dim light or darkness must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 15}) as wisps of darkness tether it in place for the next minute, or until it is exposed to bright light.

trait.name: Pain Focus
entries: While it has fewer than 69 hit points, the shadar-kai may dash or make a melee attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Creeping Apathy
entries: If the shadar-kai ends its turn without dealing or receiving damage, its AC is reduced by 4 until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Backswing
entries: If the shadar-kai misses with a melee attack, its next melee attack this turn is made at advantage.

trait.name: Shadow Portals
entries: The shadar-kai treates any two areas of dim light or darkness within 30 ft. as adjacent to each other for the purposes of making attacks, linked by portals that appear as the shadar-kai attacks with its chain sickle and disappear as the chain sickle is retracted through them.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shadar-kai makes three attacks with its spiked chain and uses its shadow jump.

action.name: Chain Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or suffer one additional effect of the shadar-kai's choice. The shadar-kai may not choose the same effect twice in a turn:
The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and {@condition restrained} if it is a medium or smaller creature. The shadar-kai may grapple only one creature this way.
The target is knocked {@condition prone}.

The target is pulled up to 10 ft. toward the shadar-kai. If this movement pulls the creature through one of the shadar-kai's shadow portals, the creature takes an additional 22 ({@damage 4d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Shadow Jump
entries: The shadar-kai magically teleports up to 30 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it teleports from and to must be in dim light or darkness.

trait.name: Pain Focus
entries: While it has fewer than 50 hit points, the shadar-kai may dash or make a melee attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Creeping Apathy
entries: If the shadar-kai ends its turn without dealing or receiving damage, its AC is reduced by 4 until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Shadows of the Raven Queen

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shadar-kai makes three attacks with its kukris. If at least two of these attacks hit the same creature, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the shadar-kai's next turn.

action.name: Shadestrike Kukris
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Darkened Dodge
entries: As a reaction to being targeted by an attack while in dim light or darkness, the shadar-kai teleports up to 15 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see. If this movement makes it an invalid target for the triggering attack, the attack misses.

trait.name: Pain Focus
entries: While it has fewer than 65 hit points, the shadar-kai may dash or make a melee attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Creeping Apathy

action.name: Curse of Beshadowed Mind {@recharge 5}

The target is knocked {@condition prone}.
The target is pulled up to 5 ft. toward the shadar-kai.

trait.name: Creeping Apathy
entries: If the shadar-kai ends its turn without dealing or receiving damage, its AC is reduced by 2 until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Cruel Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage. If this damage triggers a saving throw to maintain Concentration, the save is made at disadvantage.

action.name: Gloom Cage {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 30 ft. in dim light or darkness must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 12}) as wisps of darkness tether it in place for the next minute, or until it is exposed to bright light.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

trait.name: Drowner
entries: When the sahuagin scores a critical hit against a creature that is holding its breath, the creature must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or lose its held breath.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sahuagin makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its trident. It may use its blood in the water ability in place of its bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Blood in the Water
entries: Each friendly sahuagin within 15 feet may use its reaction to make a bite attack.

reaction.name: Raid Leader
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 10 feet attacking an ally of the sahuagin, the sahuagin may make a trident attack against the attacker.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

action.name: Water Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Devouring Maw {@recharge 5}
entries: A spectral maw manifests in a 10 foot radius around a point within 60 feet. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of the sahuagin's next turn. Any creature that starts its turn in the maw's area takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage and the sahuagin gains an equal amount of temporary HP.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sahuagin makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its spear.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Quick Squeeze
entries: The ratfolk may move through any space larger than its skull without squeezing.

trait.name: Gnaw Through
entries: The ratfolk can burrow a tiny hole through one foot of nonmagical wood in ten minutes, or through one foot of stone or soft metal in one hour.

trait.name: Scurry Away!
entries: As a bonus action, the ratfolk can move up to its speed directly away from a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Backswing
entries: If the ratfolk misses with a melee attack, its next melee attack this turn is made at advantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ratfolk makes three attacks with its censer.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Plague Censer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage and be infected with {@disease filth fever|ConfC}. On a natural 1, censer is ripped from the ratfolk's grasp and flung 15 ft. away.

reaction.name: Infected Resilience
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack, the ratfolk may halve the attack's damage. If the attack dealt slashing or piercing damage, one creature within 5 feet must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be infected with {@disease filth fever|ConfC}.

trait.name: Gnaw Through
entries: The ratfolk can burrow a tiny hole through one foot of nonmagical wood in ten minutes, or through one foot of stone or soft metal in one hour.

trait.name: Scurry Away!
entries: As a bonus action, the ratfolk can move up to its speed directly away from a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ratfolk has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the ratfolk's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Breacher
entries: A creature that is Surprised by one or more breach vermin must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened}. A {@condition frightened} creature repeats this save at the end of each of its turns after the first, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ratfolk makes three attacks: two with its glaive and one with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rusted Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage. On a critical hit, the target is infected with {@disease lockjaw|ConfC}. On a natural 1, the blade breaks and becomes unusable.

action.name: Brace for Charge {@recharge}
entries: Until the beginning of the breach vermin's next turn, whenever a creature enters its melee range it may make a glaive attack against it. If the attack hits, the creature may not move closer to the breach vermin this turn.

trait.name: Gnaw Through

An affected creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

A creature that succeeds on its save is immune to this ability for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Illusory Wyrmling (1/Day)
entries: The kobold creates a medium shadowy dragon in an unoccupied space that it can see within 120 feet. The illusion lasts for 1 minute, or until it loses concentration (as if it were concentrating on a spell). As a bonus action, the kobold can move the illusion up to 60 feet. At any point during its movement, it can cause the illusion to exhale a blast of energy in a 15-foot cone originating from its space. Each creature in the cone must succeed on a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw, taking {@damage 3d6} fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries: The kobold hurls a saw-toothed steel ring at a creature within 10 feet. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity Saving Throw or suffer {@damage 1d4} piercing damage as the trap snaps shut on them. Until the creature breaks free of the trap, its movement is reduced by 5 feet and it can't take reactions. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 12} Strength check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach from a trap on a success. Each failed check deals 1 piercing damage to the trapped creature.

action.name: Quick Snare (1/Day)

The {@condition restrained} creature can make a Dexterity saving throw with disadvantage at the end of each of its turns and ends the {@condition restrained} effect on a success.

trait.name: Ambusher
