entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Steadfast
entries: Allied creatures within 10 feet of the devil can't be {@condition frightened} and have +1 AC.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes two attacks: one with its beard and one with its glaive.

action.name: Beard
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target can't regain hit points. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Wounding Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage.  If this attack was made at advantage, the target suffers an infernal wound. A wounded creature loses 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points at the end of its turn for each wound it has. This effect ends when the target receives magical healing, or when a creature uses its action to stanch the wounds with a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom (Medicine) check.

reaction.name: Follow Up
entries: As a reaction to a devil of CR 4 or greater hitting a creature within 10 feet of the bearded devil with an attack, the bearded devil may make a glaive attack against the same creature at advantage.

reaction.name: Battle Frenzy
entries: As a reaction to starting its turn below 26 hit points, the bearded devil may go into a frenzy. Until the end of its next turn, the devil has resistance to all damage and makes attacks at advantage.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Barbed Hide
entries: At the start of each of its turns, the barbed devil deals 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage to any creature grappling it or {@condition grappled} by it.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Paranoid
entries: The devil can't be surprised. It has advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks made to determine if a creature intends to betray it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three attacks with its Claws or uses its Hurl Flame twice.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage and the creature is {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Tail Lash
entries: As a reaction to a creature entering the devil's reach, the devil may force the creature to succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be pushed 5 feet backwards and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Master Shapechanger
entries: As a bonus action, the yochlol can polymorph into a form that resembles a female drow, a giant spider, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The yochlol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The yochlol can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack (Spider form only)
entries: The yochlol makes two Bite attacks and uses its Compel.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. (10 ft. in demon form), one target. {@h}6 ({@dice 1d6 + 3}) piercing in spider form damage plus 18 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Compel
entries: The yochlol compels one creature {@condition charmed} by it to move up to half its speed and make a single weapon attack as a reaction.

action.name: Metamorphose (Demon form only)
entries: The yochlol breathes a foul miasma into the lungs of a {@condition charmed} creature. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or have its Constitution score reduced by {@dice 1d10} until it completes a long rest. A creature whose Constitution is reduced to 0 in this way transforms into a Drider.

action.name: Charm (Drow form only, concentration)
entries: One humanoid the yochlol can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed}. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the yochlol's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. When the yochlol's charm ends on a creature, the target takes 44 ({@damage 8d10}) psychic damage and is immune to this yochlol's Charm for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Secret Mouth (Demon or Drow form only)
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the yochlol may make a bite attack against the attacker.

reaction.name: Dissolve (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 111 Hit Points, the Yochlol disolves into a cloud of poisonous gas and moves up to its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity. A creature whose space it moves through in this way must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn. At the beginning of its next turn, the yochlol reverts to its true form.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The demon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Spectral Weapons
entries: The demon's attacks treat all creatures as unarmored (an unarmored creature's AC is usually 10 plus its Dexterity modifier.)

action.name: Multitattack
entries: The demon makes two attacks with its maddening touch and uses its whispers of madness, if available.

action.name: Maddening Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) psychic damage and the target's Wisdom is reduced by 2 ({@dice 1d4}) until it completes a short or long rest. A creature reduced to 0 Wisdom in this way becomes hostile to all living creatures, including itself, until it recovers.

action.name: Whispers of Madness {@recharge 5}
entries: Each non-fiend, non-undead creature within 30 ft. must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature uses its reaction to move up to make a melee attack against a living creature in range.

action.name: Create Allip
entries: One {@condition unconscious} humanoid creature within 10 ft. of the demon must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or make a melee attack against itself. If the attack hits, the creature dies and rises as an allip at the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Shadow Glide
entries: As a reaction to taking damage of a type it is resistant to, the demon may teleport up to 60 feet and turn {@condition invisible} until it makes an attack or uses its whispers of madness.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The wastrilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Corrupt Water
entries: At the start of each of the wastrilith's turns, exposed water within 30 feet of it is Corrupted. Underwater, this effect lightly obscures the area until a current clears it away.

A creature that starts its turn in the area, or enters it for the first time on a turn, must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be unable to distinguish friend from foe for the next hour, or until it leaves the area. On a success, a creature becomes immune to the effect for 24 hours.

trait.name: Villiform Teeth
entries: The wastrilith can maintain a
grapple even while {@condition incapacitated} or dead. A
creature that fails an attempt to escape the
wastrilith's grapple takes 6 ({@dice 1d12}) piercing
damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wastrilith uses Grasping Spout and makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Needle-Toothed Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d12 + 4}) piercing damage, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). While a creature is {@condition grappled} in this way, the wastrilith can't bite another creature or use its breath weapon, and this attack scores a critical on a 18-20 against it.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Grasping Spout
entries: The wastrilith magically launches a spout of water at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw, and it has disadvantage if it's underwater. On a failed save, it takes 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) acid damage and is pulled up to 60 feet toward the wastrilith. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't pulled.

action.name: Boiling Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The wastrilith exhales a stream of boiling water in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Ice Barrier
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 111 hit points, the wastrilith raises a barrier of ice comprised of up to 10 contiguous panels, each 20 ft. by 20 ft. and 1 ft. thick., and wholely within 120 ft. A creature in the wall's space when it forms is moved to a side of its choice.
The wall can be damaged and breached; each 20-foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to acid, cold, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The vrock has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Demonic Rampage
entries: When the vrock reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the vrock gains 11 ({@dice 2d10}) temporary HP. If the creature was a demon, the vrock instead gains 20 temporary HP and can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a beak attack.

trait.name: Inevitable Betrayal
entries: The vrock has advantage on the first attack it makes each turn against an ally.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The vrock doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vrock makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Stunning Screech (1/Day)
entries: The vrock emits a horrific screech. Each creature within 20 feet of it that can hear it and that isn't a demon must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the vrock's next turn.

reaction.name: Spores
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 33 HP, the vrock exudes a  15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores that extends out from the vrock. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, a target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Emptying a vial of holy water on the target also ends the effect on it.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the tanarukk can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The tanarukk has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Burning of Aeons
entries: Whenever the tanarukk takes fire damage, it gains 10 temporary hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tanarukk makes three melee attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or lose an ear.

action.name: Fireburst Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target suffers an additonal effect:
If the target was not on fire, it catches fire. Until someone takes an action to extinguish it, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

If the target was on fire, it unleashes an explosion of flame. Each creature within 20 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half as much damage on a success.

reaction.name: Fury Unleashed
entries: As a reaction to passing a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, the tanarukk erupts into flame. For the next minute, the tanarukk and any creature {@condition grappled} by it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns, and deals an additional 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage with each of its attacks.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the tanarukk can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The tanarukk has advantage on saving throws against spells and other tragical effects.

trait.name: Unbridled Rage
entries: Whenever the tanarukk moves, it must move directly toward the creature that most recently took hostile action against it, if it can see one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tanarukk makes three melee attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or lose an ear.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, the tanarukk may grapple a creature (escape {@dc 15}) or shove it {@condition prone}.

action.name: Skullcleaver Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage. This attack is made at advantage against a {@condition grappled} creature.

reaction.name: Fury Unleashed
entries: As a reaction to passing a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, the tanarukk erupts into flame. Until a creature takes an action to extinguish it, the tanarukk and any creature {@condition grappled} by it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns, and deals an additional 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage with each of its attacks.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The demon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or Darkness, the demon can take the Hide action as a Bonus Action.

trait.name: Light Dependance
entries: While in darkness, the demon is {@condition invisible}. While in bright light, the demon has advantage on attack rolls, but loses its damage resistances.

trait.name: Spectral Weapons
entries: The demon's attacks treat all creatures as unarmored (an unarmored creature's AC is usually 10 plus its Dexterity modifier.)

trait.name: Dread Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 60 ft. of the demon that cannot see it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multattack
entries: The demon makes two attacks with its soul-rending claws.

action.name: Soul-Rending Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) psychic damage or, if the demon had advantage on the attack roll, 13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) psychic damage. A {@condition frightened} humanoid killed by this attack has its soul trapped in an iron token that the demon extracts from its throat.

reaction.name: Shadow Glide (Dim light only)
entries: As a reaction to taking damage of a type it is resistant to, the demon may teleport up to 60 feet and turn {@condition invisible} until it makes an attack. If it does, it can't make attacks on its next turn.

variant.name: Note: Soul Tokens
entries: Casting Remove Curse on a soul token frees the soul trapped within it, reducing the token to rust.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The quasit can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a bat (speed 10 ft. fly 40 ft.), a centipede (40 ft., climb 40 ft.), or a toad (40 ft., swim 40 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The quasit has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Claws (Bite in Beast Form)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage and become {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn. This attack is made at advantage against a {@condition frightened} creature.

action.name: Invisibility (concentration)
entries: The quasit magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks or uses Scare.

action.name: Scare {@recharge}
entries: One creature of the quasit's choice within 20 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. If the quasit is {@condition invisible}, it may use this ability as Bonus Action.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The marilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The marilith's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The marilith can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

trait.name: More Fearsome Than Death
entries: If another demon within 60 feet would fail a Wisdom save, the marilith may choose for it to succeed. If it does, the demon is {@condition frightened} of the Marilith until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The marilith makes seven attacks, one of which may be with its Constrict.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the marilith can grapple the target (escape {@dc 17}).

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and can't breathe, and the marilith can't constrict another target.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the marilith adds 5 to its AC against the triggering attack.

reaction.name: Overwhelm
entries: As a reaction to missing a creature it is grappling with a melee attack, the marilith may add 5 to its attack roll.

reaction.name: Tail Lash
entries: As a reaction to a creature entering the marilith's reach, the marilith may force the creature to succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet backwards and knocked {@condition prone}. A creature has advantage on this save if the marilith has a creature {@condition grappled} with its Constrict ability.

reaction.name: Crush
entries: As a reaction to a creature the marilith has {@condition grappled} with its Constrict ability speaking or casting a spell with a verbal component, the marilith crushes the air out of its lungs. The creature immediately begins to suffocate.

reaction.name: Teleport
entries: As a reaction to passing a saving throw against a spell, the marilith magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet closer to the spell's caster..

variant.name: Note: Rules Clarification
entries: The marilith's Crush reaction triggers after the triggering spell resolves.

variant.name: Note: Rules Reminder
entries: A suffocating creature can survive for a number of rounds equal to its Constitution modifier (minimum of 1 round). At the start of its next turn, it drops to 0 Hit Points and is dying, and it can't regain Hit Points or be stabilized until it can breathe again.

trait.name: Mindless Hate
entries: If the mane attempts to do anything other than attack the nearest creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 5} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the mane instead attacks the nearest creature.

trait.name: Acidic Cloud
entries: When a mane dies, it dissolves into a cloud of noxious vapor. A creature within 5 feet must make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or take 3 ({@dice 1d6}) points of acid damage.

action.name: Maddening Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage and the target has disadvantage on attacks that don't target the mane on its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hezrou has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sickening Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the hezrou must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or subtract {@dice 1d4} from attack rolls and saving throws it makes until the start of its next turn. If the Hezrou has 68 HP or fewer, a creature instead subtracts {@dice 1d8} from attack rolls and saving throws until the start of its next turn on a failed save.

trait.name: Bootlicker
entries: A creature within 30 feet of the Hezrou may use its action to authoritatively shout a command. The command must be worded in such a manner as to make the course of action sound reasonable, and the Hezrou has advantage on this save if the command does not involve violence. If a creature does, the Hezrou must make a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw or begin to follow the command. The Hezrou may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hezrou makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@dice 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage. If this attack targets a dead or {@condition unconscious} creature, the Hezrou is shrouded in magical darkness until the end of its next turn, becoming heavily obscured.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}({@dice 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Spiderlike
entries: The haures can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings and across webs, without penalty. While in contact with a web, the haures knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Gleeful Carnage
entries: While adjacent to three or more hostile creatures, the haures has advantage on attack rolls. If the haures takes or deals damage, it treats all adjacent creatures as hostile until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The haures' long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The haures has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The haures makes three attacks, one of which may be with its bite. It may replace one of its attacks with either a use of its Web Grab or its Goring Charge, if available.

action.name: Ravenous Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the goristro gains resistance to all damage until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: War Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. Creatures within 5 feet of the target must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking half the attack's damage on a failed save.

action.name: Web Grab
entries: Each creature in a 10 ft. radius centered on a point within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or be dragged up to 30 ft. toward the haures.

action.name: Goring Charge {@recharge 5}
entries: The haures moves up to 30 feet in a straight line and can move through the space of any creature smaller than Large. The first time it enters a creature's space during this move, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or take 40 ({@damage 6d10 + 7}) piercing damage and be pushed ahead of the haures for the rest of this move. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, it is also knocked {@condition prone}. A {@condition prone} creature makes this save at disadvantage.
Reaction

action.name: Quick Pick
entries: As a reaction to a hostile creature moving into the haurus' range, the haurus makes a war pick attack against it.

trait.name: Hard Faller
entries: The goristro has vulnerability to fall damage. While the goristro is within 5 ft. of a precipice at least 10 feet high, it has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would Frighten it.

trait.name: Refuge in Fury
entries: If the goristro would be {@condition frightened}, it may choose not be. If it does, it cannot distinguish friend from foe for the next minute.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The goristro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goristro uses its Goring Charge and makes a Bite attack. It may replace its Goring Charge with two Fist attacks.

action.name: Ravenous Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the goristro gains resistance to all damage until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet backwards.

action.name: Hoof
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC: 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Goring Charge
entries: The goristro moves up to 30 feet in a straight line and can move through the space of any creature smaller than Large. The first time it enters a creature's space during this move, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 5d10 + 7}) piercing damage and be pushed ahead of the goristro for the rest of this move. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, it is also knocked {@condition prone}. A {@condition prone} creature makes this save at disadvantage.
Reaction

action.name: Vicious Stomp
entries: As a reaction to a {@condition prone} creature receiving magical healing within 5 feet of it, the goristro makes a hoof attack against it.

variant.name: Note: Rules Reminder
entries: A roll that has both advantage and disadvantage is considered to have neither, and rolls only a singe {@dice D20}, even if multiple circumstances impose disadvantage and only one grants advantage or vice versa. In such a situation, you have neither advantage nor disadvantage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The glabrezu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Brittle Shell
entries: If the glabrezu takes 20 or more bludgeoning damage from a single source, its AC is reduced to 14 until it completes a short or long rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The glabrezu makes four attacks: one with its seizer claw and one with its crusher claw and two with its sucker punch.. It may replace one of its claw with its word of chaos, if available.

action.name: Seizer Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and dragged up to 5 feet towards the glabrezu. The glabrezu can grapple only a single target at a time.

action.name: Crusher Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or suffer disadvantage on attack rolls that use Strength until it completes a short or long rest.

action.name: Sucker Punch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Word of Chaos {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of the glabrezu that can hear it (including the glabrezu) must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature must use its reaction to move up to half its speed and make a melee attack against a creature that succeeded on this save, or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn if it can not. A creature cannot fail this save voluntarily.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the ghour moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Desecrated Aura
entries: A creature that attempts to cast divine magic (such as a Cleric or Paladin spell) within 15 ft. of the ghour takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the end of the creature's following turn.

trait.name: Ferocity
entries: When the ghour is reduced to 0 hit points, it may use its multiattack before falling {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The ghour has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Legendary Resistances (3/Day)
entries: If the ghour fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ghour makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with Baphomet's Rage.

action.name: Cleaving Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d12 + 5}) slashing damage. If this damage reduces a creature to 0 Hit Points, any excess damage can be applied to another creature within reach that has an AC equal to or below the initial attack roll.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Baphomet's Rage
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that the ghour can see must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must use its reaction to move up to 20 feet in a direction of the ghour's choice. If it ends this movement within 5 ft. of one or more creatures, it must make a melee attack against one of them.

action.name: Sickening Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 10 ft. wide, 30 ft. long line must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or take 45 ({@damage 10d8}) Poison damage and be {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn, or half as much damage on a succcess.

reaction.name: Gouging Toss
entries: As a reaction to a creature moving within 5 ft. of it, the ghour forces the creature to succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage and be  knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Maddened Roar (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 137 hit points, the ghour lets out an earsplitting scream. Each creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the ghour's next turn and {@condition deafened} for the next minute.

trait.name: Careening Slosh
entries: If the Gau Ding moves at least 20 ft. in a straight line, then moves in an opposed direction, it begins to slosh. Until the end of its turn, each creature that it passes within 5 ft. of must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 9 ({@dice 2d8}) fire and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Dinner Bell
entries: A creature that misses the gau ding with a melee weapon attack is overcome with visions of itself being torn apart by hungry dogs. The attacker must succeed on a DC Wisdom saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage and be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Cauldron
entries: The top of the gau ding is a boiling cauldron of bones and broth. A creature that starts its turn in the cauldron takes 22 ({@dice 5d8}) fire and 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage. A creature killed by this damage can be disgorged as a wight under the cauldron's control. When encountered, the gau ding has 7 ({@dice 2d4 + 2}) corpses in its cauldron.

trait.name: Affection Weakness
entries: As bonus action, a creature that did not attack the gau ding this turn may attempt a {@dc 20} Animal Handling check. On a success, the Gau Ding must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for the next minute by the creature, or until the creature deals damage to it.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: The gau ding can't be affected or detected by spells of 3rd level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Spiritlinked Resistance
entries: If the gau ding fails a saving throw, it may consume one of the corpses contained within it to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gau ding makes two attacks with its snatching claws.

action.name: Snatching Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 1d12 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (Escape {@dc 23}). The gau ding has two arms capable of grappling.

action.name: Snapping Jaws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the gau ding bites off a hand or foot of the target.

action.name: Bay
entries: The gau ding lets out a terrifying polyphonic howl as flames burst from its mouths and eyes and its cauldron bubbles and sputters. Each creature within 120 ft. that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the gau ding for the next minute and drop what it's holding. A {@condition frightened} creature repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Disgorge Animus {@recharge 5}
entries: Roll a {@dice d20}. on a 1-10, the gau ding births a Wight from its cauldron. On an 11-17, it births a Deathlock Wight. On an 18-20, it births a Slaughter Wight.

reaction.name: Bones for the Broth
entries: As a reaction to being missed with an attack of opportunity by a {@condition frightened} creature, the gau ding makes a snatch attack against the attacker.

reaction.name: Bloodied Birth
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 238 hit points, the Gau Ding immediately recharges and uses its Disgorge Animus twice.

legendary.name: Into the Pot!
entries: The gau ding tosses one creature {@condition grappled} by its Snatching Claws into its cauldron.

legendary.name: Spirit Breath
entries: Each creature in a 30 ft. cone must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}) by long, many-jointed spectral arms that extend from nearby surfaces. A flying creature has advantage on this saving throw. A creature that starts its turn {@condition grappled} in this way takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) Psychic damage.

legendary.name: Body Breath
entries: The gau ding emits a torrent of slimy, half-dissolved flesh from one of its mouths. Each creature in a 30 ft. cone must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 ft. away and take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage. The area becomes difficult terrain, and a creature that starts its turn in the area or enters it for the first time on a turn must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Corrosion Weakness
entries: If the ferrolith takes 10 or more acid damage from a single source, it loses its resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage until the begining of its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The ferrolith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ferrolith makes three attacks with its claws, either of which it may replace with a use of its Compel.

action.name: Adamantine Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d8 + 3}) slashing damage. This attack scores a critical on an 18-20.

action.name: Compel
entries: The ferrolith compels one creature {@condition charmed} by it to move up to half its speed and make a single weapon attack as a reaction.

action.name: Charm (Concentration)
entries: One humanoid the ferrolith can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed}. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the fiend's verbal commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. When the ferrolith's charm ends on a creature, the target takes 44 ({@damage 8d10}) psychic damage and is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Barrage of Razors {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 30 ft. cone must succceed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 45 ({@damage 10d8}) slashing damage, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Larvae Haze
entries: The dretch is surrounded by a cursed aura in which wounds become infested with dretch larvae. Whenever a creature within 5 feet takes damage, it takes one additional damage for each adjacent dretch. A new dretch hatches from the corpse of a creature slain in this area after 24 hours.

trait.name: Foul Earth
entries: When the dretch dies, the ground in a 10 ft. radius around it is corrupted. Plants in the area wither and die, and magical healing that a creature in the area receives is reduced by half.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dretch makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The chasme can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The chasme has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Drone
entries: The chasme produces a horrid droning sound to which demons are immune. A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the chasme that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or deal only half damage with weapon attacks until the end of its next turn. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more falls asleep until it takes damage or another creature takes an action to wake it.

action.name: Proboscis
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}16 ({@damage 4d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 24 ({@damage 7d6}) necrotic damage. On a critical hit, the target is {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Demonic Abduction
entries: One demon of CR 5 or lower that the chasme has seen in the last 10 days must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be forced to switch positions with the chasme. A creature that passes this save is immune to this ability for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Spread Plague {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be afflicted with {@disease fading ague|ConfC}.

trait.name: Shed Flesh
entries: Whenever the bulezau is affected by its rot ability or by that of another bulezau, its AC increases by 2 and it gains vulnerability to bludgeoning damage until it completes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bulezau's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The bulezau has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

action.name: Outsize Ranseur
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Barbed Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d12 + 2}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or become infected with {@disease flitrot|ConfC} and become {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn as it retches a gout of flies.

action.name: Rot {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature (including the bulezau) within 15 ft. that does not have all of its hit points must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage, or half as much on a success.

reaction.name: Fend off
entries: As a reaction to a creature entering its reach, the bulezau may make an outsize ranseur attack against it. If the attack hits, the creature's speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The bebilith can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Scent Paragon
entries: The bebilith can track the aproximate location, by scent, of each living creature in a 5 mile radius. A creature that does not mask its scent has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide from the bebiith.

trait.name: Final Curse
entries: A creature that reduces the bebilith to 0 HP must make a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. While cursed in this way, the creature is unaffected by any magic that would return it to life.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The bebilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bebilith makes one attack with its bite and two attacks with its forelegs, one of which it may replace with its soulchar web, if available.

action.name: Fusevenom Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A {@condition poisoned} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success, or taking 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage on a failure.

A creature that dies while {@condition poisoned} in this way explodes. Each creature within 10 ft. of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) force damage, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Rending Forelegs
entries: Foreleg. Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is wearing nonmagical armor, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 is destroyed.

action.name: Soulchar Web {@recharge 5}
entries: The bebilith launches webbing in a 15 foot radius within 60 feet. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by webbing (escape {@dc 17}). A creature {@condition restrained} in this way takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature that teleports out of the web takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) force damage and must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the bebilith's next turn.
The webbing can be attacked and destroyed (AC 15; hp 10; immunity to bludgeoning, fire, poison, and psychic damage)

bonus.name: Bind
entries: The bebilith may use its webbing to restrain a  {@condition prone} target (escape {@dc 18}). If the target is Large or smaller, the bebilith may then attach the creature to its back as part of this action. A creature {@condition restrained} in this way takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the barlgura can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Juggernaut Leap
entries: The barlgura's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet when it has a running start. If the barlgura jumps at least 20 feet, it may land in the space of any medium or smaller creature. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage. On a successful save, the creature isn't knocked {@condition prone} and is pushed 5 feet out of the barlgura's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the barlgura's space.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The barlgura makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its fists.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Slam
entries: The barlgura slams a {@condition grappled} creature into a wall or floor. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution Saving Throw or take 33 ({@damage 6d10}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the barlgura's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

action.name: Hurl
entries: The barlgura hurls a {@condition grappled} creature up to 40 feet. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Death Throes
entries: When the balor dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 ({@damage 20d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Blazing Gaze
entries: When a creature that the balor can see and that can see the balor's eyes starts its turn within 15 ft. of the balor, it catches fire. Until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid this effect at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the balor until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

trait.name: Limited Magic Resistance
entries: The balor has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. On saves against magical effects that would Blind it, the balor has disadvantage, instead of advantage.

trait.name: Demonic Weapons
entries: The balor's weapons are manifestations of its innate demonic magic, and appear only as the balor is attacking with them.

trait.name: Huge Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the balor may spend half of its movement to attempt a {@dc 22} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the balor. While climbing on the balor, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the balor, and the balor has disadvantage on melee attacks against it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The balor makes two attacks: one with its lightning blade and one with its burning lash. It may replace one of its attacks with a use of its Teleport.

action.name: Lightning Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning damage. If the balor scores a critical hit, it rolls damage dice three times, instead of twice. Creatures within 5 feet of the target must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking half the attack's damage as on a failed save.

action.name: Burning Lash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}43 ({@damage 10d6 + 8}) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 25 feet toward the balor. For each roll of 6 on the damage dice, this attack deals an additional {@damage d6} fire damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The balor magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Creatures climbing on the balor are not teleported with it.

monster.name: Abyssal Chicken
languages: telepathy 60 Ft. (Works Only With Creatures That Understand Abyssal)

trait.name: Bad Flier
entries: The abyssal chicken falls at the end of a turn if it's airborne and the only thing holding it aloft is its flying speed.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage. If this attack targeted an {@condition unconscious} creature, the abyssal chicken may lay an egg in the wound as a bonus action.

reaction.name: Henpeck
entries: As a reaction to a creature within range receiving magical healing, the abyssal chicken may make a bite attack against it.

trait.name: Heart Sight
entries: The sprite can magically sense the emotional state of creatures it can see.

trait.name: Corner of Your Eye
entries: The sprite is  {@condition invisible} to creatures with less than 20 Passive Perception. Whenever it is hit with an attack, this trait is disabled for the next minute, or until it is missed with an attack.

trait.name: Forest Guardian
entries: The sprite is bound to a particular forest. A forest bound to one or more sprites has the following features:
The forest has a secret name, known only to those who reside there and those they trust implicitly.
The entire forest counts as difficult terrain to those who do not know its name.
Creatures who do not know the forest's name have disadvantage on checks made to navigate or to track creatures.
Creatures native to the forest have advantage on checks made to hide from creatures who do not know its name.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage.

action.name: Spirit Away (concentration)
entries: One creature within 60 feet must succeed on a {@dc 11} Charisma saving throw or be banished to the edge of the forest. A creature has advantage on this save if it knows the forest's name. If this effect ends before 1 minute has passed, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied. Otherwise, the target doesn't return.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Dancing Feint
entries: When the satyr takes the dodge action, it has advantage on all attacks and saving throws until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Deceitful Strike
entries: Attacks the satyr makes at advantage deal an additional 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage.

trait.name: Name Thief
entries: The satyr may make a single attack or move up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity at the beginning of the turn of any creature whose name it posesses.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The satyr makes three attacks, one of which may be with its ram.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Curious Pluck
entries: As a reaction to a creature missing it with a melee weapon attack, the Satyr may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or have one thing it is carrying or wielding stolen. If the satyr was wielding a weapon, it drops its own weapon as part of this reaction.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Dancing Feint
entries: When the satyr takes the dodge action, it has advantage on all attacks and saving throws until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Deceitful Strike
entries: Attacks the satyr makes at advantage deal an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Curious Pluck
entries: As a reaction to a creature missing it with a melee weapon attack, the Satyr may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or have one thing it is carrying or wielding stolen. If the satyr was wielding a weapon, it drops its own weapon as part of this reaction.

trait.name: Iron Boots
entries: While moving, the redcap has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the redcap remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a corpse.

trait.name: Outsize Strength
entries: While grappling, the redcap is considered to be Medium. Also, wielding a heavy weapon doesn't impose disadvantage on its attack rolls.

action.name: Rouse Blood
entries: The redcap targets an friendly redcap, giving them Bloodlust for the next minute. Creatures affected with bloodlust gain an additional attack, and gain 10 temporary HP when they reduce a creature to 0 HP.

action.name: Peck Eyes
entries: The redcap calls crows down to peck at the eyes of up to two creatures it can see within 5 feet of eachother. The creatures must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 3d8}) piercing damage. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more loses an eye.

action.name: Ironbound Pursuit
entries: The redcap moves up to its speed to a creature it can see and kicks with its iron boots. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Soak Cap
entries: As a bonus action, the redcap soaks its hat in the blood of a dead or {@condition unconscious} creature. Until the end of its next turn, the redcap has resistance to damage dealt by weapons not made of cold iron and advantage on all attacks.

trait.name: Iron Boots
entries: While moving, the redcap has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

trait.name: Outsize Strength
entries: While grappling, the redcap is considered to be Medium. Also, wielding a heavy weapon doesn't impose disadvantage on its attack rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The redcap makes three attacks with its cruel nail.

action.name: Cruel Nail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage and the target's speed is reduced to zero as its shadow is nailed to the ground. The creature may remove a nail with a {@dc 14} Strength (Athletics) check, or may free itself by spending half its movement and taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage per nail it rips itself free from.

action.name: Ironbound Pursuit
entries: The redcap moves up to its speed to a creature it can see and kicks with its iron boots. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Soak Cap
entries: As a bonus action, the redcap soaks its hat in the blood of a dead or {@condition unconscious} creature. Until the end of its next turn, the redcap has resistance to damage dealt by weapons not made of cold iron and advantage on all attacks.

trait.name: Iron Boots
entries: While moving, the redcap has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

trait.name: Outsize Strength
entries: While grappling, the redcap is considered to be Medium. Also, wielding a heavy weapon doesn't impose disadvantage on its attack rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The redcap makes three attacks with its wicked sickle.

action.name: Barbed Sling
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target begins to bleed, losing {@dice 1d4} hit points at the start of each of its turns. This effect ends when a creature succeeds on a {@dc 12} medicine check to stanch the wound as an action, or when the bleeding creature receives magical healing.

action.name: Ironbound Pursuit
entries: The redcap moves up to its speed to a creature it can see and kicks with its iron boots. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Soak Cap
entries: As a bonus action, the redcap soaks its hat in the blood of a dead or {@condition unconscious} creature. Until the end of its next turn, the redcap has resistance to damage dealt by weapons not made of cold iron and advantage on all attacks.

trait.name: Iron Boots
entries: While moving, the redcap has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

trait.name: Outsize Strength
entries: While grappling, the redcap is considered to be Medium. Also, wielding a heavy weapon doesn't impose disadvantage on its attack rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The redcap makes three attacks with its skin peeler.

action.name: Skin Peeler
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage and the target begins to bleed, losing {@dice 1d4} hit points at the start of each of its turns. This effect ends when a creature succeeds on a {@dc 12} medicine check as an action, or when the bleeding creature receives magical healing. On a critical hit, this weapon does an additional 7 damage.

action.name: Ironbound Pursuit
entries: The redcap moves up to its speed to a creature it can see and kicks with its iron boots. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Soak Cap
entries: As a bonus action, the redcap soaks its hat in the blood of a dead or {@condition unconscious} creature. Until the end of its next turn, the redcap has resistance to damage dealt by weapons not made of cold iron and advantage on all attacks.

trait.name: Blurred Movement
entries: Attack rolls against the quickling have disadvantage unless the quickling is {@condition incapacitated} or has its movement speed reduced.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the quickling is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Small and Distant
entries: While at least 60 ft. from any hostile creature, the quickling can attempt to Hide as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The quickling makes three dagger attacks.

action.name: Cutpurse Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the quickling steals a worn or carried item from the target.

reaction.name: Cackling Caprice
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the quickling may force the creature to succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pixie has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Corner of Your Eye
entries: The pixie is  {@condition invisible} to creatures with less than 20 Passive Perception. Whenever it is hit with an attack, this trait is disabled for the next minute, or until it is missed with an attack.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 (1 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 (1 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Pixie Dust
entries: One creature within 15 feet gains a 60 foot fly speed for the next hour.

action.name: Grasping Vines
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by entangling vines (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Drowsy Drift
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or fall asleep until the sleeper takes damage or someone uses an action to shake or slap the sleeper awake.

trait.name: Nymph Magic Resistance
entries: The oread has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. On solstices and equinoxes, the oread  can't be affected by spells of 2nd level or below.

trait.name: Sure-footed
entries: The oread has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Mountain Echo
entries: Whenever a spell is cast within 30 ft. of the oread, the spell takes effect twice. The oread chooses the targets for the duplicate spell. If the spell requires concentration, the oread must concentrate on it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The oread makes three attacks with its elusive bow, one of which it may replace with a Rough Shove.

action.name: Elusive Bow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage and the oread becomes {@condition invisible} to the target until the end of the oread's next turn. This bow can fire arrows, bolts, or javelins.

action.name: Rough Shove
entries: One creature within 5 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or take 25 ({@damage 6d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and be pushed 20 ft. away. A creature that cannot see the oread makes this save at disadvantage.

reaction.name: Catch Token
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a ranged weapon attack, the oread catches the projectile. As long as it holds this projectile, it gains +3 AC against the attacker's attacks. If the oread fires the projectile back at its owner, the attack hits automatically.

trait.name: Nymph Magic Resistance
entries: The oread has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. On solstices and equinoxes, the oread  can't be affected by spells of 1st level or below.

trait.name: Sure-footed
entries: The oread has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The oread makes two attacks with its elusive bow.

action.name: Elusive Bow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage and the oread becomes {@condition invisible} to the target until the end of the oread's next turn. This bow can fire arrows, bolts, or javelins.

action.name: Rough Shove
entries: One creature within 5 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and be pushed 15 ft. away. A creature that cannot see the oread makes this save at disadvantage.

reaction.name: Catch Token
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a ranged weapon attack, the oread catches the projectile. As long as it holds this projectile, it gains +2 AC against the attacker's attacks. If the oread fires the projectile back at its owner, the attack hits automatically.

trait.name: Nymph Magic Resistance
entries: The nymph has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. On solstices and equinoxes, the nymph  can't be affected by spells of 2nd level or below.

trait.name: Eldritch Grace
entries: While the nymph is moving, she becomes indistinct and insubstantial. Attacks of opportunity are made against her at disadvantage, and she has resistance to all damage on her turn.

trait.name: Divine Visage
entries: A creature that can see the nymph has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws and Wisdom (Perception) checks made to perceive anything other than the nymph.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the effect at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the nymph until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nymph uses two of its Whisper Game, Parting Touch, or Entreat in any combination.

action.name: Whisper Game
entries: One creature within 15 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the nymph for the next minute. A creature that starts its turn within 15 ft. of a creature {@condition charmed} in this way must make the same save.
A {@condition charmed} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Parting Touch
entries: The nymph touches a {@condition charmed} creature within 5 ft. As long as it remains {@condition charmed}, the creature takes 7 ({@dice 2d6}) nonlethal psychic damage at the start of each of its turn for each 5 ft. away from the nymph that it is.

action.name: Entreat
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by the nymph moves up to its speed and makes an attack against a target of the nymph's choice.

action.name: Ensnare
entries: The nymph sets a magical trap, designating a 10 foot radius circle that it touches. Each time a nonfey creature steps into the circle, the trap is triggered. The triggering creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom or fall asleep until it takes damage or a creature uses its action to wake it. A creature with 16 or higher Passive Perception can detect and avoid the circle.

reaction.name: Blinding Beauty
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a melee attack by a creature that is not averting its gaze, the nymph adds 5 to its AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, the attacker must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until it completes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Nymph Magic Resistance
entries: The nymph has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. On solstices and equinoxes, the nymph  can't be affected by spells of 1st level or below.

trait.name: Eldritch Grace
entries: While the nymph is moving, she becomes indistinct and insubstantial. Attacks of opportunity are made against her at disadvantage, and she has resistance to all damage on her turn.

trait.name: Divine Visage
entries: A creature that can see the nymph has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws and Wisdom (Perception) checks made to perceive anything other than the nymph.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the effect at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the nymph until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.

action.name: Parting Touch (concentration)
entries: One creature within 5 ft must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for the next minute. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature takes 3 ({@dice 1d6}) nonlethal psychic damage at the start of each of its turn for each 5 ft. away from the nymph that it is.
A {@condition charmed} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Entreat
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by the nymph moves up to its speed and makes an attack against a target of the nymph's choice.

action.name: Ensnare
entries: The nymph sets a magical trap, designating a 10 foot radius circle that it touches. The first time a nonfey creature steps into the circle, the trap is triggered. The triggering creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom or fall asleep until it takes damage or a creature uses its action to wake it. A creature with 16 or higher Passive Perception can detect and avoid the circle.

reaction.name: Blinding Beauty
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a melee attack by a creature that is not averting its gaze, the nymph adds 4 to its AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, the attacker must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until it completes a short or long rest.

variant.name: Note: Rules Reminder
entries: A creature with disadvantage on Perception checks takes a -5 penalty to its Passive Perception.
RAW is a little unclear on this, but Jeremy Crawford has opined that allied creatures share situational awareness; ie, something is hidden from either no allied creatures or all of them.

trait.name: Infectious Laughter
entries: When the nilbog dies, the nearest goblin within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw or become a nilbog.

trait.name: Trickster's Tumble
entries: The nilbog can take the Dodge action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Healing Reversal
entries: If the nilbog would receive a source of magical healing, it instead loses that many hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nilbog makes two attacks, one of which it may replace with its Distorted Perception, if available.

action.name: Fool's Scepter
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. For the next minute, the target falls {@condition prone} and takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage whenever it misses with an attack.

action.name: Distorted Perception {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 60 ft must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the next minute whenever the creature moves the nilbog chooses the direction of that movement. An affected creature repeats this saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on a success.

reaction.name: Trade Weapon
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee weapon attack, the nilbog trades weapons with the attacker. It is considered attuned to any magic weapons that require attunement.

reaction.name: Damage Reversal
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack or hostile spell, the nilbog activates its damage reversal, taking no damage and instead being healed for the same amount. The nilbog receives healing beyond its maximum hit points as temporary hit points.

trait.name: Blessings of the Sea
entries: The nereid's favor may be gained by casting offerings of blood, honey or libations into the sea. If the nereid finds the offering sufficient, it may bestow any of the following blessings upon a ship and its crew:

items.name: Impelled
entries: The ship's speed increases by 50% and its crew gains a swim speed equal to its movement speed for the duration of its journey.

items.name: Unerring
entries: Winds and currents will not push the ship from its course.

items.name: Unmistakeable
entries: The ship's crew has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks for the duration of the voyage.

items.name: Shoaling Host
entries: The ship is accompanied on its journey by waters teeming with fish.

trait.name: Nymph Magic Resistance
entries: The nereid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. On solstices and equinoxes, the nymph  can't be affected by spells of 1st level or below.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nereid makes three attacks with its shucking knife, one of which it may replace with its parting touch, if available.

action.name: Shucking Knife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a vehicle or is wearing heavy armor, this attack is made at advantage and deals an additional 18 ({@damage 4d8}) damage.

action.name: Parting Touch
entries: One creature within 5 ft must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for the next minute. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature takes 7 ({@dice 2d6}) nonlethal psychic damage at the start of each of its turn for each 5 ft. away from the nereid that it is.
A {@condition charmed} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Conjure Tempest
entries: The nereid summons a storm to follow a ship. The storm begins mild and gradually worsens every hour until the boat either reaches dry land, capsizes, or its crew makes offerings to the nereid sufficient to appease it. If the nereid is killed, the storm abates only once the ship has sunk.

reaction.name: Curse of Bounty (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 98 hit points, the nereid forces one creature it can see within 60 ft. to succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. While cursed in this way, a creature that is at sea has its pockets continually fill with gold pieces.

If the creature is swimming, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw at the beginning of each of its turns or descend 60 ft. If the creature is in a boat or ship, the ship instead continually fills with gold. A ship begins to capsize after {@dice 1d12} hours of harboring a cursed creature.
The gold turns to sand if this curse is removed, or if the cursed creature sets foot on land.

trait.name: Nymph Magic Resistance
entries: The naiad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. On solstices and equinoxes, the naiad can't be affected by spells of 2nd level or below.

trait.name: Gifted Token
entries: The naiad may gift a lock of her hair to a creature. For the next year and a day, while it bears this token the creature gains a +2 bonus to its Charisma score. If the creature takes any action the naiad considers dishonorable, this magic ends.

trait.name: Polymorph Weakness
entries: Spells and magical effects that would polymorph the naiad persist until dispelled.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The naiad uses its aquatic aid twice, one of which it may replace with the dash action.

action.name: Aquatic Aid
entries: One creature that the naiad can see within 10 ft. of a body of fresh water must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage and be pushed 10 ft. in a direction of the nymph's choice.

While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature takes 3 ({@dice 1d6}) nonlethal psychic damage at the start of each of its turn for each 5 ft. away from the nymph that it is.
A {@condition charmed} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

reaction.name: Blood to Water
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the naiad forces the attacker to succceed on a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. While cursed in this way, a creature submerged in fresh water must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw at the start of each of its turns or acquire a point of {@condition exhaustion}.

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the meenlock must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the start of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Dread Revels
entries: The meenlock has advantage on attack rolls against creatures that are {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Brittle Carapace
entries: If the meenlock takes 10 or more bludgeoning damage from a single source, its AC is reduced to 13 until it completes a long rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The meenlock makes three melee attacks and uses its shadow teleport.

action.name: Dousing Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Any lights the target is carrying are extinguished.

action.name: Shadow Teleport
entries: The meenlock and up to one creature it is grappling teleport up to 30 ft. to an unoccupied space of dim light or darkness that it can see.

action.name: Terror Spawn
entries: One creature within 10 ft. that is {@condition frightened} must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or take 33 ({@damage 6d10}) psychic damage and have its Charisma score reduced by {@dice 1d4} until it completes a short or long rest. A creature killed by this damage transforms into a meenlock.

reaction.name: Chitter
entries: As a reaction to being missed with an attack by a creature that is {@condition frightened} of it, the meenlock forces the creature to succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the meenlock's next turn.

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the meenlock must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the start of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Brittle Carapace
entries: If the meenlock takes 10 or more bludgeoning damage from a single source, its AC is reduced to 13 until it completes a long rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The meenlock makes two melee attacks and uses its shadow teleport.
