Until a creature takes an action to clear it, attacks against the affected creature are made at advantage, and the affected creature or object can't benefit from being {@condition invisible}.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes a burst of dust. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the Myrmiddon's next turn. If the myrmidon is doused in water (at least one gallon), this trait ceases to function for the next minute.

reaction.name: Explosive
entries: As a reaction to taking fire damage, the dust myrmidon may force each creature within 10 feet to succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half as much damage on a success.

trait.name: Weightless
entries: Whenever the myrmidon takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from the source of the damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with its

action.name: Ashwake Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) fire damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be unable speak or breathe until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Ember Gout {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 10 feet must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or catch fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes burst of ash. The attacker succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) fire damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Weightless
entries: Whenever the myrmidon takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from the source of the damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmiddon makes three melee attacks, one of which it may replace with a use of its Updraft, if available.

action.name: Iron War Fan
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. *Hit* 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning or slashing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away. This attack has advantage against a levitating or flying creature.

action.name: Updraft {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 5 feet must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be levitated 5 ft. off the ground for the next minute. A creature may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

reaction.name: Elemental Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the myrmidon unleashes a burst of air. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Current-Dancer
entries: As a reaction to a creature being pushed out of its range, the myrmidon may move up to 15 ft. towards the creature and make a melee attack against it.

trait.name: Water Form
entries: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Freeze
entries: If the elemental takes 10 or more cold damage in a turn, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 feet and it loses its resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks, one of which it may replace with a use of its Whelm.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If this attack targets a creature {@condition restrained} in the elemental's space, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} constitution saving throw or lose its held breath and begin to suffocate.

action.name: Whelm
entries: One creature in the elemental's space must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space. A creature may take an action to make a {@dc 14} Strength (Athletics) check to remove itself or another creature from the elemental.

reaction.name: Crashing Wave
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the elemental can move into the attackers space and use it's Whelm ability.

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 feet.

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

action.name: Stoke
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) fire damage. If the target on fire, it takes an additional 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Backdraft
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack by a creature more than 10 feet away, the elemental lets loose an explosion of flame. Each creature within 10 feet must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage and be pushed 5 feet away. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is also knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Flashover (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 52 HP, the fire elemental ignites each creature and flamable object within 30 feet of it. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature that is already on fire instead takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Earthen Form
entries: If the elemental is doused in water (at least one gallon), it loses its damage resistances until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Shatter Earth {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 30 foot cone must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 19 ({@damage 3d12}) bludgeoning damage and fall {@condition prone}, or half as much damage on a success. The affected area becomes difficult terrain.

trait.name: Air Form
entries: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Updraft
entries: A creature that starts its turn sharing a space with the elemental must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constutiton saving throw or be levitated 5 feet off the ground until the start of its next turn, or until it leaves the elemental's space. While levitating in this way, the creature moves with the elemental when it moves.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. This attack is made at advantage against a levitating or flying creature.

action.name: Whirlwind {@recharge 4}
entries: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage and is flung up 20 feet away from the elemental in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes an object, such as a wall or floor, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.
If the saving throw is successful, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't flung away or knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Eject
entries: As a reaction to being hit by a creature levitating in its space, the elemental may move up to half its speed, then eject the attacker into an adjacence space of the elemental's choice.

trait.name: Freeze
entries: Whenever the mephit takes cold damage, its speed is reduced by 10 and it gains vulnerability to bludgeoning damage until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a wave of crashing water. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Watery Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, the mephit can grapple the target (escape {@dc 12}).. This attack has advantage against a creature submerged in water.

action.name: Drench {@recharge}
entries: The mephit spews a stream of cold water in a 15 foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. If this damage causes a creature to make a concentration check, it makes it at disadvantage.

reaction.name: Crashing Wave
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the mephit can make a melee attack. If the attack hits, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Weightless
entries: Whenever the mephit takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from the source of the damage.

trait.name: Void Aura
entries: A creature within 5 feet of the mephit cannot speak or breathe.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it implodes. Each creature within 15 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Thunder damage and be pulled 10 feet towards the mephit.

action.name: Dragging Winds
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit* 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or be pulled 10 feet towards the mephit. This attack has advantage against a levitating or flying creature.

action.name: Cavitate (Concentration, Recharge 6)
entries: For the next minute, the mephit is surrounded by sucking winds. A creature that start its turn within 5 feet of the mephit must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or be unable to move away from it until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Vaccuum Channel
entries: As a reaction to an allied creature within 15 feet being targeted with an attack, the mephit may pull the allied creature 10 feet closer. If the allied creature ends this movement out of range of the triggering attack, the attack misses.

trait.name: Weightless
entries: Whenever the mephit takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from the source of the damage.

trait.name: Condense
entries: If the steam mephit takes cold damage, it is reduced to size Tiny and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of steam, leaving behind a cloud that fills a 15-foot-diameter sphere centered on its space. The sphere is heavily obscured. Wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise lasts for 1 minute.

action.name: Hazy Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit* 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away. This attack is made at advantage against a creature with lower than 12 Passive Perception.

action.name: Heavy Air {@recharge}
entries: One creature within 5 feet must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be slowed by its labored breaths for the next minute. An affected creature cannot make more than a single attack in a turn, and repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

reaction.name: Misty Advance
entries: As a reaction to a creature targeting the mephit with a ranged attack, the mephit may teleport up to thirty feet toward the attacker. If it ends this teleportation within 5 feet of the attacker, it may impose disadvantage on the triggering attack.

trait.name: Pull Together (1/Day)
entries: When the mephit is reduced to 0 HP, it may turn to smoke and disipate instead of dying. At the beginning of its next turn, it appears within 15 feet of the space it left with 1 Hit Point.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of choking smoke. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 9} Constitution saving throw or be unable to speak or breathe for the next minute. A creature may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit* 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If this attack was made at advantage, it deals an additional 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage.

action.name: Billow (Concentration, Recharge 6)
entries: The mephit wreaths itself in a 10 ft. radius cloud of dense smoke that travels with it. The smoke spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured.

reaction.name: In the Wind
entries: As a reaction to taking slashing or bludgeoning damage, the mephit may teleport up to 30 feet to a location it can see.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The mephit can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a wave of ooze. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) acid damage and be covered in acid until a creature uses its action to scrape or wash the acid off itself or another creature. A creature covered in the acid takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) acid damage at end of each of its turns.

action.name: Sticky Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage. This attack is made at advantage against a {@condition grappled} creature.

reaction.name: Stick (Recharge 6)
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack by a Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet, the mephit forces the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled}. While {@condition grappled} by the mephit in this way, the target takes {@damage 2d4} acid damage at the start of each of its turns.

reaction.name: Split
entries: When a mephit that is small or larger is subjected to slashing damage, it splits into two new tiny mepits. Each new mephit has hit points equal to half the original mephit's, rounded down.

trait.name: Soluble
entries: If the mephit is doused in water (at least one gallon), it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or disintegrate.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of salt. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage and gain vulnerability to the next source of acid damage it would take.

action.name: Salt Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dessicate {@recharge}
entries: One creature within 5 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. The creature is unaffected by the next source of healing it would receive before the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Salt the Wound
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 5 feet of it taking 5 or more slashing damage, the mephit may cause it to take an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Earthglide
entries: The mephit can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the mephit doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of sticky mud. Each Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of the creature's next turn.

action.name: Muddy Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and the target must make a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. A creature knocked {@condition prone} in this way must spend its full movement to stand.

action.name: Soften Earth (Concentration, Recharge 6)
entries: The ground in a 10 ft. radius around the mephit becomes difficult terrain for the next minute. This radius moves with the mephit.

reaction.name: Non-Newtonian
entries: As a reaction to taking bludgeoning or slashing damage, the mephit increases its AC by 2 until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Stoneglide
entries: The mephit can burrow through nonmagical stone. While doing so, the mephit doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of minerals. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Sparkling Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage. This attack deals an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage to a {@condition charmed} creature.

action.name: Fool's Greed {@recharge}
entries: The mephit holds out a worthless gem. Each creature within 5 feet that can see it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the mephit until the end of the mephit's next turn, or until the creature takes damage. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature can do nothing but stare greedily at the gem.

reaction.name: Scratchproof Facing
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a weapon attack that deals piercing damage, the mephit may gain a +5 bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

trait.name: Molten Body
entries: If the mephit takes 10 or more cold damage from a single source, it is {@condition petrified}.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of magma. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage and have molten rock splashed on it. Until it or another creature takes an action to clear the rock, the creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Magma Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage. The target must then succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be pushed 5 feet away.

action.name: Molten Fissure {@recharge}
entries: A 15 ft. long, 5 ft. wide, 5 ft. deep fissure originating from the mephit opens in the earth. Each creature in the area when it appears must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or fall in, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage and falling {@condition prone}. For the next minute, a creature that starts its turn in the fissure takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Melt Weapon
entries: As a reaction to being hit with nonmagical melee weapon attack, the mephit melts and warps the weapon. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls.

trait.name: Electrified
entries: A creature that hits the mephit with a melee attack can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of lightning. Each creature within 10 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage. A creature wearing metal armor makes this save at disadvantage.

action.name: Static Shock
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) lightning damage and the target has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

action.name: Charge Weapon {@recharge}
entries: The mephit charges a weapon that isn't held or carried with electricity. The next creature to touch the weapon must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the mephit's following turn.

reaction.name: Numbing Sparks
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the mephit may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Lightning damage and drop whatever it is holding and be unable to pick up dropped objects until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Revealing Radiance
entries: The mephit sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. Creatures in the radius of bright light cannot benefit from invisibility.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of light. Each creature within 15 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) radiant damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. A creature that averts its eyes at the beginning of its turn succeed automatically on this save.

action.name: Illuminating Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) radiant damage and the next attack roll made against this target in the next minute is made at advantage.

action.name: Sunstrike
entries: Each creature in a 5 ft. radius centered on a point within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 3 ({@dice 1d6}) fire and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) radiant damage. A creature that is averting its eyes has disadvantage on this save.

reaction.name: Dazzling Flash
entries: As a reaction to a creature hitting the mephit with a melee attack, the mephit may emit a bright flash, dazzling the creature. Until the end of the mephit's next turn, the attacker treats the mephit as {@condition invisible}.

trait.name: Chip Away
entries: The mephit is encased in a brittle icy shell. When the mephit is reduced below its maximum hit points, its AC is reduced by 4.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of ice. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 9} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 3d4}) cold damage and have its movement speed reduced by 20 until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Chilling Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit* 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) cold damage and the target's movement speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn. A creature whose movement speed is reduced to 0 in this way must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Encase in Frost {@recharge}
entries: One creature within 5 feet must succeed on a {@dc 9} Strength saving throw or gain 5 ({@dice 2d4}) temporary hit points. While it has these temporary hit points, the creature has vulnerability to fire damage and is {@condition restrained}.

reaction.name: Icy Gust
entries: As a reaction to a creature hitting the mephit with a melee attack, the mephit may make a melee attack against the attacker. If the attack hits, the creature is pushed back 5 feet.

variant.name: Note: Rules Reminder
entries: Effects don't stack with themselves. The speed reduction from Chilling Touch can ony be applied once to a given creature, even if it is hit by multiple mephits.

trait.name: Molten Repair
entries: Whenever the mephit is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

trait.name: Mirror Dweller
entries: The mephit treats reflective objects as doorways to extradimensional spaces resembling the space reflected by them. While in a mirrored surface, the mephit can control what images appear reflected in it. If a mirrored surface containing a mephit ceases to be reflective, the mephit is expelled into an unoccupied adjacent space and {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of glass. Each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage and have glass shards embedded in its flesh. Until a creature takes an action to remove the shards, the creature's movement speed is reduced by 10.

action.name: Slice
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 6 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage. On a critical hit, the mephit may use its invibility as a bonus action this turn, if available.

action.name: Invisibility (Concentration, Recharge 6)
entries: The mephit magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks.

reaction.name: Reflect
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a spell of first level or below, the mephit may make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the mephit may change the spell's target to another creature within 15 feet.

trait.name: Fire Step
entries: Surfaces the mephit moves over ignite and burn for 1 minute. A creature that starts its turn in a burning area, or enters it for the first time on a turn, takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of fire. Each creature within 15 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw or catch fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Glowing Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) fire damage. If the target is wearing metal armor, it takes an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Burning Steel {@recharge}
entries: Each creature in a 15 ft. cone that is wielding a metal weapon takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage and must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or drop its weapon in an adjacent space.

reaction.name: Wind-Whipped
entries: As a reaction to a creature making an opportunity attack against it, the mephit may impose disadvantage on the attack. If the attack misses, the attacker is pulled 5 feet towards the mephit.

variant.name: Note: Rules Clarification
entries: Fire Step is intended to work like Moonbeam, rather than like Spike Growth. A creature does not take the damage multiple times in the turn if they move through multiple burning spaces.

trait.name: Earthglide
entries: The mephit can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the mephit doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of earth. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. If the mephit is doused in water (at least one gallon), this trait ceases to function for the next minute.

action.name: Dirty Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage. This attack deals an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage to a {@condition prone} creature.

action.name: Earthbreak {@recharge}
entries: Each creature in a 15 foot cone must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 6 ({@damage 1d12}) bludgeoning damage and fall {@condition prone}, or half as much damage on a success. The affected area becomes difficult terrain.

reaction.name: Durable
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a weapon attack, the mephit may gain resistance to that attack's damage. If the mephit is doused in water (at least one gallon), this trait ceases to function for the next minute.

trait.name: Weightless
entries: Whenever the mephit takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from the source of the damage.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of dust. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. A {@condition blinded} creature can repeat the saving throw on each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the mephit is doused in water (at least one gallon), this trait ceases to function for the next minute.

action.name: Scrabbling Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage. If this attack is made at advantage, it deals an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

action.name: Clinging Dust {@recharge}
entries: One creature within 10 feet must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or be outlined in pale, clinging dust. Until a creature takes an action to clear it, attacks against the affected creature are made at advantage, and the affected creature or object can't benefit from being {@condition invisible}.

reaction.name: Explosive
entries: As a reaction to taking fire damage, the dust mephit may force each creature within 10 feet to succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half as much damage on a success.

trait.name: Weightless
entries: Whenever the mephit takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from the source of the damage.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of ash. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) fire damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Choking Ash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit* 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) fire damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be unable speak or breathe until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Ember Gout {@recharge}
entries: One creature within 10 feet must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw or catch fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

reaction.name: Cinder Wheeze
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the mephit may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) fire damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Weightless
entries: Whenever the mephit takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from the source of the damage.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of air. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 9} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Gust
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit* 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away. This attack has advantage against a levitating or flying creature.

action.name: Updraft {@recharge}
entries: One creature within 5 feet must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be levitated 5 ft. off the ground until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Current-Dancer
entries: As a reaction to a creature being pushed out of its range, the mephit may move up to 10 ft. towards it and make a gust attack against it.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the zaratan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Earth Shaking Movement
entries: Whenever the zaratan moves at least 10 feet, the ground in a 120 foot radius becomes difficult terrain for other creatures until the beginning of its next turn. Structures in the area collapse. Each creature in the area, and each creature climbing on the zaratan must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Titanic Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the zaratan may spend its full movement to attempt a {@dc 18} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the zaratan's legs. A creature may attempt the same check to climb from the zaratan's legs to its back, or from its back to its head.

items.name: Legs
entries: While climbing on the zaratan's legs, a creature has advantage on attacks against it.

items.name: Back
entries: While climbing on the zaratan's back, the zaratan has immunity to damage the creature deals and cannot target the creature with melee attacks. A creature on the zaratan's back that falls {@condition prone} does not fall off.

items.name: Head
entries: While climbing on the zaratan's head, the creature has advantage on melee attacks against the zaratan and the zaratan cannot target the creature with melee attacks. A creature on the zaratan's head that falls {@condition prone} does not fall off.

trait.name: Ponderous
entries: The zaratan moves only when it uses its stride action.

trait.name: Slow to Wrath
entries: When the Zaratan is reduced below 100 HP, it gains a second legendary action and immediately regains all spent actions.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The zaratan makes two attacks: one with its stride and one with its bite, its spit rock or its swalow.

action.name: Stride
entries: The zaratan takes a single step, moving up to its movement speed. Each creature in a 20 foot radius area within 20 feet must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 26 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half as much on a success. A {@condition prone} creature has disadvantage on this save.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) piercing damage.  If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the zaratan can't bite another target.

action.name: Spit Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 17} to hit, range 120/240 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 6d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The zaratan makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the zaratan, its attacks bypass the zaratan's resistances, and it takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the zaratan's turns.

If the zaratan takes 40 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the zaratan.

action.name: Spew Debris {@recharge 5}
entries: The zaratan exhales rocky debris in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails the save by 5 or more is knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Stride
entries: The zaratan uses its stride.

legendary.name: Chomp
entries: The zaratan makes one bite attack or uses its Swallow.

legendary.name: Retract
entries: The zaratan retracts its head into its shell. Each creature climbing on its head must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or fall 100 feet. On a successful save, the creature may leap to the zaratan's back as a reaction. If it cannot, it falls.

legendary.name: Bone-Shattering Roar (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The zaratan emits a titanic roar in a 120-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Dampened Flames
entries: If the phoenix takes 10 or more cold damage from a single source, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Fiery Rebirth
entries: When the phoenix is reduced to 0 hit points, it does not die. Instead, its body crumbles to ash, revealing a new phoenix fledgeling. This trait is suspended in an area infused with unholy power by the {@spell Hallow} spell. If the phoenix's body is completely destroyed while this trait is suspended, the phoenix dies.

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: The phoenix can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage and 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage and 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage. On a critical hit, the target is {@condition blinded} until the end of the phoenix's next turn.

trait.name: Gargantuan Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the phoenix may spend half of its movement to attempt a {@dc 17} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the phoenix. While climbing on the phoenix, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the phoenix, and the phoenix can't make melee attacks against it. A creature that isn't {@condition prone} may attempt this check as a reaction in place of an attack of opportunity.

trait.name: Dampened Flames
entries: If the phoenix takes 10 or more cold damage from a single source, attacks against it are made at advantage until the begining of its next turn. If the phoenix takes 20 or more cold damge from a single source, its Inner Fire trait ceases to function until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Fiery Rebirth
entries: When the phoenix is reduced to 0 hit points, it does not die. Instead, its body crumbles to ash, revealing a new phoenix fledgeling. This trait is suspended in an area infused with unholy power by the {@spell Hallow} spell. If the phoenix's body is completely destroyed while this trait is suspended, the phoenix dies.

trait.name: Inner Fire
entries: A creature that touches the phoenix or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the phoenix fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The phoenix makes two attacks, one of which may be with its beak.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}34 ({@damage 4d12 + 8}) piercing damage and 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d8 + 8}) slashing damage and 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the phoenix can't use its talons on another target.

action.name: Shake Off
entries: Each creature climbing on the phoenix must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or lose its grip and fall. The phoenix may then make a talon attack targeting a creature that failed this save as it falls.

action.name: Wing Attack
entries: The phoenix beats its wings. Each creature within 20 feet of the phoenix that isn't climbing on it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 36 ({@damage 8d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage, be pushed 10 ft. away, and and be knocked {@condition prone}. The phoenix can then fly up to half its flying speed.

action.name: Eruption Wake {@recharge 5}
entries: The phoenix moves up to its fly speed, and a 20-foot wide section of the ground it passes over begins to shake violently. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

At the beginning of the phoenix's next turn, lava erupts in the area. For the next minute, each creature that enters the area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Quickening Scream (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 158 hit points, the phoenix lets out a mighty screech. Each creature within 60 feet must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the phoenix's next turn. {@dice 1d4} Lava Children emerge from unoccupied areas of lava within range.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the leviathan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Partial Freeze
entries: If the leviathan takes cold damage, the leviathan partially freezes; until the end of its next turn, its speeds are reduced by 20 feet and its normally {@condition invisible} vital organs are revealed. Attacks made from inside the leviathan against it have advantage until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The leviathan deals double damage to objects and structures (included in Tidal Wave).

trait.name: Water Form
entries: The leviathan can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Slow to Wrath
entries: When the Leviathan is reduced below 100 HP, it gains a fourth legendary action and immediately regains all spent actions.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The leviathan makes two attacks: one with its whelming slam and one with either its evoke essence, brine, or tidal wave abilities, if available.

action.name: Whelming Slam
entries: Creatures in a 20 foot radius within 20 feet must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 1d10 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition grappled} in the leviathan's space (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the target is unable to breathe unless it can breathe water and moves with the leviathan. If the leviathan moved at least 100 feet before using this ability, it deals an additional 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Evoke Essence
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the leveiathan must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or have their lungs fill with water. If the creature cannot breathe water, it cannot speak or breathe and begins to drown. A creature may take its action to cough and retch up water, ending the effect.

action.name: Brine {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature that is drowning must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or have the water ripped from its lungs, taking  36 ({@damage 8d8}) bludgeoning damage. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is forced to expend {@dice 1d4} unexpended hit dice. If it cannot, the creature drops to 0 HP.

action.name: Tidal Wave {@recharge}
entries: While submerged, the leviathan magically creates a wall of water centered on itself. The wall is up 250 feet long, up to 250 feet high, and up to 50 feet thick. When the wall appears, all other creatures within its area must each make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw. A creature takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) bludgeoning damage and is pushed 50 feet away on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The leviathan may affect creatures inside of it with this ability.

legendary.name: Undertow
entries: One creatue within 60 feet must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be dragged up to 60 feet toward and into the leviathan, {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} per its Whelming Slam ability. The leviathan then rolls to recharge its Tidal Wave, if applicable.

legendary.name: Waterspout
entries: One creature within 120 feet must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or be launched 60 feet into the air by a watery tornado. It remains there until the end of its next turn, when it drops.

legendary.name: Jet Breath (Costs 2 Actions.)
entries: The Leviathan spews a line of seawater 10 feet wide and 120 feet long. Creatures in the area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage and be pushed 15 feet away. The leviathan may choose to eject a creature that is inside of it with this ability, launching it up to 60 feet away.

legendary.name: Wash Away (Costs 4 Actions)
entries: The leviathan creates an enormous 100 foot radius whirlpool that lasts for a minute. Each creature that starts its turn in the whirlpool has one spell or magical effect of its choice dispelled, and must make a strength saving throw or be drawn 30 feet towards the whirlpool's center. Creatures in the leviathan are immune to this effect.

monster.name: Isimir, Scream of the Frozen World

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the isimir fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Earth Shaking Movement
entries: Whenever the isimir moves at least 10 feet, the ground in a 60 foot radius becomes difficult terrain for other creatures until the beginning of its next turn. Structures in the area collapse. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Titanic Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the isimir and equipped with ice climbing gear may spend 30 feet of movement to attempt a {@dc 18} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the isimir's legs. A creature may attempt the same check to climb from the isimir's legs to its waist, waist to torso, or from its torso to its head.

items.name: Legs
entries: While climbing on the isimir's legs, a creature must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw at the start of its turn or fall off.

items.name: Waist
entries: While climbing on the isimir's waist, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the isimir.

items.name: Torso
entries: While climbing on the isimir's torso, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the isimir and on saving throws against its abilities.

items.name: Head
entries: While climbing on the isimir's head, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the isimir and on saving throws against its abilities. If a creature on the isimir's head scores a critical hit against it, the isimir falls {@condition prone} at the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Ponderous
entries: The isimir moves only when it uses its stride action.

trait.name: Hoarfrost Aura
entries: A creature that ends its turn within 300 ft. of the isimir must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or gain 36 ({@dice 8d8}) temporary hit points. A creature that moved at least 20 ft. on its turn makes this save at advantage. While it has these hit points, a creature is {@condition restrained} and gains vulnerability to bludgeoning and fire damage. A creature killed by bludgeoning or thunder damage in this area shatters, destroying its body.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The isimir makes two attacks with its stride, one of which it may replace with its Blade of the Cold Mountain or its Brush off.

action.name: Stride
entries: The isimir takes a single step, moving up to its movement speed. Each creature within 10 ft. of where it ends this movement must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 26 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, or half as much on a success. A {@condition prone} creature has disadvantage on this save.

action.name: Blade of the Cold Mountain
entries: The isimir begins to swing its blade, targeting a 100 ft. long, 20 ft. wide line within 100 ft. At the beginning of its next turn, the strike lands, and each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 66 ({@damage 12d10}) bludgeoning damage and 45 ({@damage 10d8}) cold damage, or half as much on a success. A creature with at least 15 Passive Perception knows precisely where the strike will land.

action.name: Brush Off
entries: The isimir attempts to dislodge a creature climbing on it. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take X bludgeoning damage and be pushed 30 ft. away.

reaction.name: Bone-Shattering Scream (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below X hit points, the isimir emits a titanic scream in a 600-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw, taking 63 ({@damage 14d8}) thunder damage and 63 ({@damage 14d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is permanantly {@condition deafened}.

legendary.name: Inhale
entries: The isimir takes a breath in. Creatures in a 120 ft. cone must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or be pulled 30 ft. towards the isimir.

legendary.name: Exhale
entries: The isimir lets a breath out. Creatures in a 120 ft. cone must succeed a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or take 36 ({@damage 8d8}) cold damage and be pushed 30 ft. away from the isimir, or half as much damage on a success. The isimir may use this ability only if it used its Inhale on the previous turn.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The tempest deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Air Form
entries: The tempest may enter a creature's space and stop there. A huge or smaller creature whose space the tempest passes through is sucked into its maelstrom.

trait.name: Grab the Wind
entries: The tempest is divided into 5 sections: Head, forewings, midwings, rearwings, and Maelstrom.

items.name: Maelstrom
entries: A creature that starts its turn in the maelstrom takes 14 ({@dice 4d6}) bludgeoning and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) thunder damage.

items.name: Damage Resistant
entries: The maelstrom is immune to all damage, and the wings are resistant to all damage.

items.name: Movement
entries: A creature can make a {@dc 19} Strength (Athletics), Dexterity (Acrobatics), Intelligence (Nature), or Wisdom (Survival) check and spend all of its movement to move one section closer to the head. A creature that succeeds by 5 or more instead advances two sections. A creature that fails by 5 or more loses its grip and falls.

items.name: Gaining Advantage
entries: If the wings take 20 or more damage from a single source (after reductions), the tempest contracts and thrashes, giving all creatures advantage on checks made to move along its length until the tempest's next turn. A creature with a fly speed has advantage on checks to navigate the tempest.

items.name: Falling
entries: A creature that loses its grip falls toward the maelstrom. It may make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw for each section it falls past, catching itself there on a success.

trait.name: Living Storm
entries: Strong winds swirl in the area covered by the storm. The winds impose disadvantage on ranged attack rolls made from further than 30 feet, or one section, away. Ranged attack rolls made from more than 60 feet, or two sections away, miss automaticially.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The tempest doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the tempest fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tempest uses its thunderous wingbeat twice.

action.name: Thunderous Wingbeat
entries: Creatures in one section of the tempest's body other than the maelstrom or head must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or take 23 ({@damage 5d8}) thunder damage. A creature that fails this save by five or more loses its grip and falls toward the maelstrom.

action.name: Sheet Lightning {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in or adjacent to the tempest must succed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) lightning damage, or half as much on a success. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more drops what its holding. Nonmetal objects fall to the maelstrom, metal objects have a 50% chance to fall to the maelstrom and a 50% chance to drop out of it.

action.name: The Living Wind (1/Day)
entries: The tempest summons two Air Elementals that appear at its head and act on initiative count 20. The elementals disperse when the tempest dies.

action.name: Screaming Ascent. (1/Day)
entries: Each creature in the tempest must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) thunder damage and lose its grip and begin to fall toward the maelstrom

action.name: Galvanic Ruin (1/Day)
entries: The tempest releases a blast

of lightning and wind in a line that is 1 mile long and 20 feet wide. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 88 ({@damage 16d10}) damage, or half as much on a failure. A creature behind full cover makes this save at advantage, takes half damage on a failure, or 1/4 damage on a success. Objects and structures take double damage from this ability.

action.name: Shed Refuse
entries: If the tempest is below 100 HP, it may attempt to eject one creature from its body. One creature in a section other than the head must make a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be lauched 30 feet away from the tempest into open air.

reaction.name: Crackling Rebuke
entries: When a creature deals 20 or more damage to the tempest's head with a melee attack, the tempest may use its reaction to force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 22 ({@dice 4d10}) lightning damge as electricity erupts from the wound.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the azer or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Stoking Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage if the target is on fire.

action.name: Chains of Fire (5-6)
entries: Each creature that is on fire within 15 feet of the azer must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of the Azer's next turn.

trait.name: Sulphureous Strikes
entries: A creature struck by the zmey has a shock of its hair turn white.

trait.name: Gargantuan Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the zmey may spend its full movement to attempt a {@dc 21} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the zmey. While climbing on the zmey, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the zmey.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The zmey has twelve heads. While it has more than one head, the zmey has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the zmey takes 30 or more damage from a single source, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the zmey dies.

trait.name: Death Curse
entries: The blood of a slain zmey pools upon the ground and resists being absorbed. If the ground is not blessed by a Ceremony or other means within 10 days, the Zmey returns to life with a new body and three additional heads at the site of its death.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the zmey fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The zmey makes as many bite attacks as it has heads. If it is grappling a creature at the start of its turn, it may replace one of its bite attacks with a swallow.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition grappled}. While a head grapples a target, the head can attack only that target.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The zmey makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition grappled} in the zmey's craw, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the zmey, its attacks ignore the zmey's damage resistances, and it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the zmey's turns. One swallowed creature is freed whenever the zmey loses a head.

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by at least two zmey heads must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution throw or take 188 ({@damage 16d10 + 100}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success. A creature makes this save at disadvantage if it is {@condition grappled} by three or more zmey heads.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The zmey exhales fire in a number of 300-foot long, 15-foot wide lines equal to the number of heads that it has. Each creature in one or more lines must make a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 ({@damage 18d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 260 hit points, the zmey immediately recharges and uses its fire breath.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: The zmey makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Inhale
entries: The zmey rolls to recharge its breath weapon.

legendary.name: Mountain Drop
entries: The dragon folds its wings and drops to the ground. Each creature beneath it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 21}). This grapple ends if the dragon moves.

legendary.name: 7-Tailed Sweep (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 25 ({@damage 7d4 + 8}) bludgeoning damage, be knocked {@condition prone}, and pushed up to 15 feet away from the dragon.

entries: A creature struck by the zmey has a shock of its hair turn white.

trait.name: Huge Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the zmey may spend half of its movement to attempt a {@dc 20} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the zmey. While climbing on the zmey, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the zmey.

trait.name: Multiple Heads

Whenever the zmey takes 30 or more damage from a single source, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the zmey dies.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The wyvern doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wyvern makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger. While flying, it can use its claws in place of one other attack.

action.name: Rending Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is wearing leather or cloth armor, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10  is destroyed.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage. The target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Pseudodragon
senses: the pseudodragon has advantage on wisdom (perception) checks that rely on sight
languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak them

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pseudodragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

trait.name: Dweomer Attuned
entries: Spells of 3rd level or below with a duration of at least 1 minute that target only the pseudodragon instead have a duration of Until Dispelled.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls {@condition unconscious} for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature uses an action to shake it awake.

trait.name: Blood Scent
entries: The drake can pinpoint, by scent, the location of any creature within 120 ft. that does not have all of its hit points.

trait.name: Dweomer Chill
entries: A creature that casts a spell within 15 feet of the drake takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage per level of the spell. A creature that starts its turn in the area while concentrating on a spell must make a Concentration check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage and 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage. Instead of dealing damage, the drake can grapple the target (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 5 ft. away.

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by both the drake and at least one of the drake's allies must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

reaction.name: Bluff Strike
entries: As a reaction to a creature entering the drake's reach, it may force the creature to succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be forced to immediately move 10 ft. away from the drake, if it can.

trait.name: Burning Rage

trait.name: Godlike Resistance
entries: If Tiamat fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead. If she does, she regains two fewer legendary action on her followihng turn.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Unless she wishes to be affected, Tiamat is immune to spells of 6th level or lower. She has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Multitrack Machinations
entries: Tiamat may concentrate on up to five spells simultaneously. She regains one fewer legendary action at the beginning of her turn for each spell she is concentrating on beyond the first. If she fails a concentration check, she loses concentration on all spells she is concentrating on.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Tiamat can use her Maddening Presence. She then makes five attacks: four with her bite and one with her tail. She may replace all of her bite attacks with a use of her worry ability.

action.name: Pargaon Breath
entries: Tiamat exhales elemental energy in a 300-foot cone, or 300 foot long, 15 foot wide line (Tiamat's choice). Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity or Constitution saving throw (Tiamat's choice), taking 91 ({@damage 26d6}) damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The damage type is either Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison (Tiamat's choice).

entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by at least two of Tiamat's heads must succeed on a {@dc 23} Constitution throw or take 110 ({@damage 20d10}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success. A creature makes this save at disadvantage if it is {@condition grappled} by three or more of Tiamat's heads. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is ripped in half and dies.

action.name: Maddening Presence
entries: Each creature of Tiamat's choice that is within 240 feet of Tiamat and aware of her must succeed on a DC: 26 Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns, and must use its turn to either dash away or attempt to hide. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Tiamat's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: Tiamat makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
entries: Tiamat beats her wings. Each creature within 30 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. Tiamat can then fly up to half its flying speed

legendary.name: Breath Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tiamat uses her Paragon Breath ability.

legendary.name: Wish (9th level spell, Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Tiamat casts any spell of 8th level or below.

immune.special: one other type determined by the dragon's former type

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Shadow Form
entries: The shadow dragon's traits change depending on lighting.
In darkness, the dragon treats all creatures as unarmored (an unarmored creature's AC is usually 10 plus its Dexterity modifier.)
In dim light or darkness it can hide as a bonus action without obscurement, submerging itself in pools of shadow.
In bright light, attacks against the dragon have advantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. If the dragon is bright light, it may replace its tail attack with two claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 22}) and {@condition restrained}. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Shadow Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales writhing shadow in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw, taking 105 ({@damage 30d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature with a shadow reduced to 0 by this damage falls into its shadow, and its shadow climbs into the material plane to replace it, with the following attributes:
The creature's shadow has the same statistics and abilities as the creature and has one hit point. It acts on the dragon's initiative and is under the dragon's control.
The creature remains conscious, but may only target its shadow with spells and abilities.
A creature can wrestle the shadow back into the shadow realm with a successful {@dc 18} Strength (Athletics) check. If it does, the creature returns to the material plane with one hit point.
If the creature's shadow receives any healing, the shadow is banished to the shadow realm. The creature returns to the material plane with one hit point.
If the creature's shadow dies, the creature is lost forever to the realm of shadow.

reaction.name: Snuff (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 369 HP, the dragon extinguishes all lights within 300 ft.

reaction.name: Shadow Glide (Dim light only)
entries: As a reaction to taking damage of a type it is resistant to, the dragon may teleport up to 60 feet and turn {@condition invisible} until the beginning of its next turn.

legendary.name: Snatch
entries: The dragon makes a claw attack against a creature that it is hidden from. If the attack hits, the target is {@condition grappled}, {@condition stunned}, and hidden from its allies until the begining of its next turn. This attack does not automatically reveal the dragon's position.

legendary.name: Shadow Tether
entries: One creature within 60 ft. that the dragon can see must make a {@dc 22} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the next time the dragon takes damage in the next minute, it takes half as much damage and the target takes the same amount.

legendary.name: Waken Shadows
entries: One creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 22}) as its shadow lunges to grip it. A creature is freed if it is in bright light.

entries: As a reaction to taking damage of a type it is resistant to, the dragon may teleport up to 20 feet and turn {@condition invisible} until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Illusory Passage
entries: The dragon can move through natural and magical foliage as though it were illusory.

trait.name: Capricious Jest
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 15 feet of the dragon and attempts to move must first make a {@dc 21} Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the dragon controls its movement this turn.

trait.name: Displacement
entries: The dragon has an illusory double that mirrors its movements imperfectly, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted until the end of its next turn and the next attack against the dragon before the dragon's next turn has advantage.

trait.name: Gargantuan Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the dragon may spend its full movement to attempt a {@dc 21} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the dragon. While climbing on the dragon, a creature is unaffected by its displacement trait.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Derealization Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an shimmering aurora of existential crises in a 300 ft. cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw, taking 98 ({@damage 28d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more becomes convinced that it is an illusion. An affected creature cannot concentrate on spells, loses concentration if it was holding it, and makes a {@dc 24} Intelligence saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature that targets itself with an attack or spell immediately ends this effect.

action.name: Depersonalization Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 300 ft. cone must make a {@dc 24} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the controlling player exchanges control of the creature with another player until the end of the dragon's next turn. At the beginning of an affected creatures turn, start a timer. The creature takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage for each 6 seconds the player takes to resolve its turn.

reaction.name: Out of Nowhere
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack while its Displacement is active, the dragon makes a tendril attack. If it hits, it may immediately us its Hurl ability as part of this reaction, and its Displacement trait is disabled until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 297 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses its Derealization Breath.

legendary.name: Slink
entries: The dragon moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.

entries: The dragon throws a creature it has {@condition grappled} up to 30 feet. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage, in addition to any damage from falling.

legendary.name: Slam (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon lifts a {@condition grappled} creature up and slams it into the ground, releasing the grapple. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage and be unable to stand on its following turn, or take half as much damage on a success.

trait.name: Illusory Passage
entries: The dragon can move through natural and magical foliage as though it were illusory.

trait.name: Capricious Jest
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the dragon and attempts to move must first make a {@dc 14} Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the dragon controls its movement this turn.

trait.name: Displacement
entries: The dragon has an illusory double that mirrors its movements imperfectly, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and pulled up to 5 feet towards the dragon.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 5 feet away from the dragon.

action.name: Derealization Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an shimmering aurora of existential crises in a 30 ft. cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more becomes convinced that it is an illusion. An affected creature cannot concentrate on spells, loses concentration if it was holding it, and makes a {@dc 14} Intelligence saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature that targets itself with an attack or spell immediately ends this effect.

reaction.name: Hurl
entries: As a reaction to being damaged by a creature it has {@condition grappled}, the dragon throws a creature it has {@condition grappled} up to 30 feet. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage, in addition to any damage from falling.

reaction.name: Slam
entries: As a reaction to a {@condition grappled} creature casting a spell, the dragon lifts the creature up and slams it into the ground, releasing the grapple. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage and be unable to stand this turn, or take half as much damage on a success.

reaction.name: Slink
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the dragon moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Capricious Jest
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the dragon and attempts to move must first make a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the dragon controls its movement this turn.

trait.name: Displacement
entries: The dragon has an illusory double that mirrors its movements imperfectly, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Bite

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Derealization Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an shimmering aurora of existential crises in a 15 ft cone.
