entries: The unicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The unicorn's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The unicorn makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its horn. If it has 33 or fewer HP, it instead makes three attacks with its hooves and one with its horn.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet back. This attack deals an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage to a {@condition prone} creature.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The unicorn magically restores 11 ({@dice 2d8 + 2}) hit points to a creature within 5 feet. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

action.name: Teleport (1/Day)
entries: The unicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 feet of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the unicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

reaction.name: Shimmering Shield
entries: As a reaction to seeing a creature make an attack, the unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The radiant idol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Aura of False Divinity
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the radiant idol must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the radiant idol until the beginning of its next turn. A creature that passes this save becomes immune to this radiant' idol's aura of false divinity for 24 hours.

trait.name: Wrathful Presence
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the radiant idol while immune to its aura of false divinity must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the radiant idol until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: As a bonus action, the radiant idol may  transform into a humanoid or angelic form, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in any form, and it reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the deva's choice).

trait.name: Chained to the Earth
entries: Creatures and objects within 30 ft. of the radiant idol may not fly by any magical means.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deva makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Crippling Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage and the target must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be unable to make more than one attack on its next turn. On a critical hit, the target's shield is destroyed, if it is wearing one.

action.name: Radiant Strike (1/Day)
entries: The radiant idol chooses a point on the ground it can see within 60 feet of it. A 30-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder of bright light appears there until the start of the radiant idol's next turn. Each creature in the cylinder when it appears or that ends its turn there must make a DC: 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Curse of Exalted Blood
entries: As a reaction to taking at least 15 points of piercing or slashing damage, the radiant idol forces one creature within 5 ft. to succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. A cursed creature takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage the first time each turn it disobeys a command of the radiant idol.

monster.name: Pegasus
languages: Elvish and Sylvan but can't speak

trait.name: Diving Overrun
entries: If the pegasus is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the target must make a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Pristine Presence
entries: If the pegasus has taken no hostile action in the last minute, a creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the pegasus must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be unable to take hostile action against the pegasus until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet back. This attack deals an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage to a {@condition prone} creature.

trait.name: Icon of Peace
entries: If the ki-rin has at least 135 hit points, a creature that targets the ki-rin with an attack or harmful spell  must first make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.
While it has at least 135 hit points, the kirin will not use its breath weapon.

trait.name: Weightless Step
entries: Whenever the ki-rin takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from the source of the damage.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The ki-rin knows if it hears a lie.

trait.name: Harbinger of Bounty
entries: A good-aligned creature that sees a ki-rin is blessed. For the next 24 hours, the creature maximizes any magical healing it receives and automatically succeeds on Wisdom (Survival) checks to forage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ki-rin uses its numinous command twice.

action.name: Numinous Command
entries: The ki-rin speaks a word of divine power. One creature within 60 ft. that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or suffer one effect of the ki-rin's choice.

items.name: Desist
entries: The creature flings one object of the ki-rin's choice that it is holding 30 ft. in a random direction.

items.name: Reflect
entries: The creature takes 38 ({@damage 7d10}) psychic damage as it is confronted with every harm it has ever done through negligence or ill intent. The damage can't reduce the target's hit points below 1.

items.name: Repent
entries: The creature falls {@condition prone} and cannot stand. An affected creature repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature makes this save with advantage if it uses its action to make an honest apology.

action.name: Divine Fury Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The ki-rin exhales holy fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area of neutral or evil alignment must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@dice 8d8}) fire and 36 ({@damage 8d8}) radiant damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Ascendant Breeze
entries: The ki-rin grants one creature within 60 ft. that it can see a fly speed equal to its movement speed that lasts for the next hour, or until the creature moves more than 60 ft. away.

legendary.name: Swords to Plowshares
entries: One weapon within 60 ft. that deals slashing or piercing damage magically blunts. For the next minute, the weapon deals bludgeoning damage instead of any other type and loses the finesse property.

legendary.name: Tranquility
entries: The ki-rin ends one magical on it that would incapacitate or immobilize it. It may use this ability while {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Icon of Peace
entries: If the ki-rin has at least 26 hit points, a creature that targets the ki-rin with an attack or harmful spell  must first make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.
While it has at least 26 hit points, the kirin will not use its breath weapon.

trait.name: Weightless Step
entries: Whenever the ki-rin takes damage, it is pushed 10 feet away from the source of the damage.

action.name: Numinous Command
entries: The ki-rin speaks a word of divine power. One creature within 30 ft. that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or suffer one effect of the ki-rin's choice.

items.name: Desist
entries: The creature drops one object of the ki-rin's choice.

items.name: Reflect
entries: The creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage as it is confronted with every harm it has ever done through negligence or ill intent. The damage can't reduce the target's hit points below 1.

items.name: Repent
entries: The creature falls {@condition prone} and cannot stand on its following turn.

action.name: Divine Fury Breath {@recharge}
entries: The ki-rin exhales holy fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area of neutral or evil alignment must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 ({@dice 2d8}) fire and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Harbinger of Bounty (3/Day)
entries: As a reaction to seeing a creature within 60 ft. receive magical healing, the ki-rin causes the healing to be maximized.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the empyrean fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The empyrean has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Empyrean uses its Shift Mood ability and makes three attacks with its maul or bolt in any combination.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}45 ({@damage 10d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage plus an additional {@damage 1d6} bludgeoning damage for each 10 feet the empyrean fell this turn. The target must succeed on a {@dc 23} Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 15} to hit, range 600 ft., one target. {@h}42 ({@damage 12d6}) damage of one of the following types (empyrean's choice): acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, radiant, or thunder. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the empyrean's next turn. A {@condition blinded} creature has disadvantage on this saving throw.

action.name: Shift Mood
entries: The Empyrean adopts one of the following moods. It may not choose the same one twice until it has selected all of them.

items.name: Impatient
entries: Creatures within 30 feet of the Empyrean have their movement speed doubled and advantage on Dexterity saving throws. The Empyrean makes an additional attack when it uses its multiattack.

items.name: Fearful
entries: Creatures within 30 feet of the empyrean must make a {@dc 23} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the Empyrean's next turn. As part of this action, the Empyrean may attempt to teleport to another plane of existence **(7th level spell)**

items.name: Joyous
entries: Creatures within 30 feet of the empyrean are unaffected by difficult terrain, and have a fly speed equal to their movement speed. The empyrean adds its Charisma modifier its damage rolls.

items.name: Lonely
entries: Creatures within 100 feet of the empyrean are dragged 100 feet closer to it. The Empyrean has vulnerability to psychic damage.

items.name: Melancholic
entries: Creatures within 30 feet of the empyrean have their movement speed halved and have disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws. The empyrean's attacks deal an addition {@damage 2d6} psychic damage this turn.

items.name: Peaceful
entries: Creatures within 30 feet of the empyrean who targets another creature with an attack or a harmful spell must first make a {@dc 23} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the attack or spell fails.

items.name: Regretful
entries: Creatures within 30 feet are healed for {@dice 20d8} hit points and freed of all debilitating effects.

items.name: Wrathful
entries: : Creatures within 30 feet of the empyrean lose concentration on spells and make all attack rolls at advantage. The Empyrean gains resistance to all damage until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Legendary Reactions
entries: The Empyrean may make a legendary reaction whenever its conditions are met, without using its reaction.

reaction.name: Psychic Instability
entries: Whenever the Empyrean takes psychic damage, it uses its Shift Mood ability.

reaction.name: Magnetic Presence
entries: Whenever the Empyrean takes 20 or more damage from a single ranged attack, it may force the attacker to make a {@dc 23} Strength saving throw or be dragged 30 feet towards it.

reaction.name: Brilliant Flash
entries: Whenever the Empyrean takes 20 or more damage from a single melee attack, it may force the attacker to make a {@dc 23} Consitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The couatl's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The couatl has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Dream Traveler
entries: The couatl can appear in the dreams of any creature it is familiar with. While in a creature's dream, the couatl may appear however it wishes, can communicate with the creature, and can free it from any poison, disease, or curse it is afflicted with.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: As a bonus action, the couatl may transform into a humanoid or beast, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in any form, and it reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the couatl's choice).

trait.name: Leaf on the Wind
entries: The first time each turn that a creature ends its movement adjacent to the couatl, the couatl may move up to 15 feet. Opportunity attacks that it provokes with this movement are made at disadvantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The couatl attacks once with its bite and once with its constrict.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage and 27 ({@damage 6d8}) radiant damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target perceives its reality as though in a dream, has a fly speed of 60 feet, and deals only half damage with weapon attacks. The target may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. When the effect ends, the target retains no memory of events that transpired while it was {@condition poisoned}.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the couatl can't constrict another target.

action.name: Crack the Sky {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature within 120 feet of the couatl, and up to three creatures within 30 feet of the first target, must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 5d8}) radiant damage and 22 ({@damage 5d8}) lighting damage, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The couatl's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The couatl has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Dream Traveler
entries: The couatl can appear in the dreams of any creature it is familiar with. While in a creature's dream, the couatl may appear however it wishes, can communicate with the creature, and can free it from any poison, disease, or curse it is afflicted with.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: As a bonus action, the couatl may transform into a humanoid or beast, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in any form, and it reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the couatl's choice).

trait.name: Leaf on the Wind
entries: The first time each turn that a creature ends its movement adjacent to the couatl, the couatl may move up to 15 feet. Opportunity attacks that it provokes with this movement are made at disadvantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The couatl attacks once with its bite and once with its constrict.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target perceives its reality as though in a dream, and the target deals only half damage with weapon attacks. The target may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. When the effect ends, the target retains no memory of events that transpired while it was {@condition poisoned}.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the couatl can't constrict another target.

trait.name: Menacing Presence
entries: If the archon has fewer than 90 hit points, a creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the archon must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the archon until the beginning of the archon's next turn. A creature that passes this save is immune to the Menacing Presence of this archon for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archon makes three attacks with its trumpet blade, one of which it may replace with its Clarion Call, if available.

action.name: Trumpet Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage. Before or after this attack, the archon's trumpet may become a greatsword, or vice versa.

action.name: Clarion Call {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 60 ft. that can hear the archon has its life essence bolstered. Non-undead creatures affected by this ability cannot be reduced below 1 HP until the beginning of the archon's next turn. Fiends and Undead creatures have disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws until the beginning of the archon's next turn.

action.name: Plane Shift
entries: The archon teleports to a location it is familiar with on this or another plane.

reaction.name: Trumpet Blast
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the archon may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage and be {@condition deafened} for the next minute. A Celestial or Fiend that fails this save by 5 or more is banished to its home plane.

trait.name: Menacing Presence
entries: If the archon has fewer than 69 hit points, a creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the archon must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the archon until the beginning of the archon's next turn. A creature that passes this save is immune to the Menacing Presence of this archon for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Far-Seeing
entries: The archon cannot be surprised. If it would otherwise be surprised, it acts on initiative count 20 this combat, instead of rolling initiative.

trait.name: Concussive Strength
entries: A creature knocked {@condition prone} by the archon must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be unable to stand on its following turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archon makes two attacks with its claws and one with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage. This attack does an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage to a {@condition prone} creature.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bear Hug
entries: One creature within 5 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 45 ({@damage 9d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition grappled}. While the archon has a creature {@condition grappled} in this way, it cannot use its multiattack.

action.name: Plane Shift
entries: The archon teleports to a location it is familiar with on this or another plane.

reaction.name: Crush
entries: As a reaction to a creature the archon has {@condition grappled} speaking or casting a spell with a verbal component, the archon crushes the air out of its lungs. The creature immediately begins to suffocate.

trait.name: Calm and Ready
entries: Creatures of the archon's choice within 30 ft. have advantage on initiative checks and on saving throws against Fear.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The archon can use its action to polymorph into any canine, such as a wolf, dog or fox, or back into its true form, which is celestial. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed, and isn't usable while polymorphed. It reverts to its celestial form if it dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archon makes two melee attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} if it is a medium or smaller creature.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Plane Shift
entries: The archon teleports to a location it is familiar with on this or another plane.

reaction.name: Loyal Defender
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 5 ft. being hit with an attack, the archon may cause the attack to hit it instead.

trait.name: Peaceful Illumination
entries: The archon sheds bright sunlight in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 feet. Creatures illuminated by it have advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks made to deescalate conflict.

action.name: Celestial Aid
entries: Up to three creatures within 60 ft. each gain 10 temporary hit points. While a creature has any of those temporary hit points, its vision is not impeded by ordinary or magical darkness.

action.name: Light the Path
entries: One creature within 60 ft. sees the shortest and most direct physical route to their current destination illuminated before them for the next eight hours, if such a route exists.

action.name: Plane Shift
entries: The archon teleports to a location it is familiar with on this or another plane.

reaction.name: Oppressive Radiance
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack or harmful spell, the archon fires a beam of holy light at the attacker or spell caster. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) radiant damage, or half as much on a success. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is {@condition blinded} until the end of the archon's next turn.

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: The solar's weapons are manifestations of its innate divine magic, and appear only as the Solar is attacking with them.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The solar knows if it hears a lie.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The solar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Cowing Presence
entries: If the solar has at least 122 HP, a creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the solar must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be unable to take hostile action against the solar until the beginning of its next turn. A creature has advantage on this save if it took damage from the solar since the end of its last turn.

trait.name: Wrathful Presence
entries: If the solar has 121 HP or fewer, a creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the solar must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the solar until the beginning of its next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, the creature has vulnerability to radiant damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the solar fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The solar attacks with its sword twice, one of which it may replace with a longbow attack..

action.name: Sword of Ruin
entries: The solar slashes with its sword and a line of incandescent light 5 feet wide and 30 feet long appears within 120 feet and lasts for a minute. A creature that starts its turn in one or more such lines, or enters one for the first time on a turn, must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take 36 ({@damage 8d8}) radiant damage, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Lifeburst Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage and the target is pushed back 10 feet. The target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw or take an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage per unexpended hit die it has, then recovers one hit die.

action.name: Healing Touch (4/Day)
entries: The solar touches another creature that is alive, or has been dead for no more than a century. If the target was dead, it is restored to life with 1 HP. Then, the target magically regains 40 ({@dice 8d8 + 4}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness. If the target is a corpse that died in the last century, it is restored to life.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The solar magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Searing Burst (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The solar emits magical, divine energy. Each creature of its choice in a 10-foot radius must make a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Blinding Gaze (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The solar targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see it, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until magic such as the {@spell lesser restoration} spell removes the blindness.

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: The planetar's weapons are manifestations of its innate divine magic, and appear only as the planetar is attacking with them.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The planetar knows if it hears a lie.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The planetar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Cowing Presence
entries: If the planetar has at least 101 HP, a creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the planetar must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be unable to take hostile action against the planetar until the beginning of its next turn. A creature has advantage on this save if it took damage from the planetar since the end of its last turn.

trait.name: Wrathful Presence
entries: If the planetar has 100 HP or fewer, a creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the planetar must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the planetar until the beginning of its next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, the creature has vulnerability to radiant damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The planetar makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Sword of Wrath
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) radiant damage and the creature must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to salt and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is {@condition petrified} until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

action.name: Plague of Locusts
entries: Each creature of the planetar's choice within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 5d10}) piercing damage. Until the end of the planetar's next turn, the affected area is difficult terrain and heavily obscured for all other creatures.

action.name: Judgement of Heaven
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or be reduced to 0 Hit Points.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The planetar touches another creature that is alive, or has been dead for no more than ten days. If the target was dead, it is restored to life with 1 HP. Then, the target magically regains 30 ({@dice 6d8 + 3}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness. If the target is a corpse that died in the last century, it is restored to life.

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: The angel's weapons are manifestations of its innate divine magic, and appear only as the angel is attacking with them.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The deva has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Numinous Presence
entries: If the angel has at least 69 HP, a creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the angel must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be unable to take hostile action against the angel until the beginning of its next turn. A creature passes this save automatically if it took damage from the angel since the end of its last turn.

trait.name: Wrathful Presence
entries: If the angel has 68 HP or fewer, a creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the angel must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the angel until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: As a bonus action, the deva may  transform into a humanoid or beast, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in any form, and it reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the deva's choice).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deva makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Luminous Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The deva touches another creature. The target magically regains 20 ({@dice 4d8 + 2}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness. If the target is a corpse that died in the last 10 days, it is restored to life.

reaction.name: Shielding Wings
entries: As a reaction to an ally being hit with an attack, the deva may move up to half its speed. If it ends this movement within 5 feet of the targeted creature, the creature's AC is increased by 2 (including against the triggering attack) and the deva's AC is decreased by 2 until the end of the deva's next turn.

reaction.name: Radiant Retribution
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack,

the deva may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be forced to expend each unexpended hit die it has, rolling each of them and taking radiant damage equal to the total rolled.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Predatory Bearing
entries: A creature that starts its turn with no adjacent allies and that can see the wolf must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the wolf can grapple the target (escape {@dc 13}). If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by both the wolf and at least one of the wolf's allies must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 24 ({@damage 7d6}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the wolf can grapple the target (escape {@dc 11}). If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by both the wolf and at least one of the wolf's allies must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Breath Sight
entries: A creature that does not need to breathe is {@condition invisible} to the stirge queen. A creature that holds its breath has advantage on checks made to hide from the stirge queen.

trait.name: Weakness Seeker
entries: The stirge queen has advantage on attacks that target creatures afflicted with a disease.

trait.name: Bleeding Aura
entries: When a creature that does not have all of its hit points starts its turn within 30 feet of the stirge queen, the stirge queen can force it to lose 2 ({@dice 1d4}) hit points. A creature with fewer than half of its hit points instead loses 5 ({@dice 2d4}) hit points.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the stirge queen fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Pinning Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}).

action.name: Blood Spear:
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage and the target is pushed 5 ft. away.

action.name: Plague Blood Torrent {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 20 foot cone must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is infected with {@disease redding ague|ConfC}.

reaction.name: Fend Off
entries: As a reaction to a creature entering its reach, the stirge queen may make an attack against the creature with its pinning talons.

reaction.name: Feed Your Queen
entries: As a reaction to a friendly stirge that has fed recently ending its movement within 5 feet of it, the stirge queen consumes the stirge, gaining 14 ({@dice 4d6}) temporary hit points.

reaction.name: Awaken Their Hunger (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 62 hit points, the stirge queen lets out a telepathic signal. Each other stirge within 30 feet may make a melee attack as a reaction.

trait.name: Breath Sight
entries: A creature that does not need to breathe is {@condition invisible} to the stirge. A creature that holds its breath has advantage on checks made to hide from the stirge.

trait.name: Weakness Seeker
entries: The stirge has advantage on attacks that target creatures afflicted with a disease.

action.name: Blood Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage and the creature must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or contract The {@disease redding ague|ConfC}. The stirge attaches to the target While attached, the stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the stirge's turns, the target loses 6 ({@dice 1d4 + 4}) hit points due to blood loss. The stirge can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement.

reaction.name: Pierce Skull
entries: As a reaction to a creature the stirge is attached to dropping to 0 HP, the stirge repositions itself, piercing the creature's head and gaining control of its body. As a bonus action, the stirge may force the creature to move up to half its speed and make a melee attack against a creature in range. The host automatically fails death saving throws while the stirge is attached, but can still be saved if the stirge is killed in time.

trait.name: Breath Sight

trait.name: Weakness Seeker

action.name: Blood Drain

The stirge attaches to the target While attached, the stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the stirge's turns, the target loses 5 ({@dice 1d4 + 3}) hit points due to blood loss. The stirge can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spider makes two attacks with its legs, one of which it may replace with a bite attack or a use of its web ability.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

action.name: Legs
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hits: 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Web {@recharge 5}
entries: The spider launches webbing in a 10 foot radius within 60 feet. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by webbing. As an action, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 13} Strength check, freeing itself on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

bonus.name: Bind
entries: The spider may use its webbing to restrain a {@condition grappled} or {@condition prone} target (escape {@dc 13}). If the target is Medium or smaller, the spider may then attach the creature to its back as part of this action.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the creature is reduced to 0 HP while {@condition poisoned}, the target stabilizes automatically. The spider may make this attack as a bonus action against a {@condition prone} enemy.

action.name: Legs
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hits: 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}).

action.name: Deadly Leap {@recharge 5}
entries: If the spider jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the spider's space into the nearest unoccupied space.

entries: The spider may use its webbing to restrain a {@condition grappled} or {@condition prone} target (escape {@dc 12}). If the target is Medium or smaller, the spider may then attach the creature to its back as part of this action.

trait.name: Cold Blooded
entries: If the cobra takes any cold damage, its speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Braille
entries: The cobra's eyes are covered by transparent scales that protect them from harm. It has disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, and advantage on saving throws to avoid being {@condition blinded}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cobra makes two attacks; one with its bite and one with its constrict. It may either of its attacks with a use of its Threat Display, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}).

action.name: Threat Display {@recharge 5}
entries: The snake raises upright, puffs up, and hisses. Until the beginning of its next turn, it may make a bite attack as a reaction to a creature entering its reach. If this attack misses, the cobra regains its reaction.

reaction.name: Crush
entries: As a reaction to a creature the cobra has {@condition grappled} with its Constrict ability speaking or casting a spell with a verbal component, the cobra crushes the air out of its lungs. The creature cannot breathe until the grapple ends and immediately begins to suffocate.

reaction.name: Bluff Strike
entries: As a reaction to a creature entering the the cobra's reach, it may force the creature to succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be forced to immediately move 10 ft. away from the cobra, if it can.

entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 64 hit points, the shark moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity. Each creature of its choice within 50 ft. that has fewer than 20 hit points must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Ocean Camouflage

trait.name: Test Bite
entries: If the shark starts its turn with no hostile creatures within 5 ft. of it, it may Dash or Disengage as a bonus action this turn.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

action.name: Invade Space
entries: The rat targets one humanoid within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity Saving Throw or have the rat enter its clothing or armor, sharing a space with it. While the rat is in the creature's attire, it has full cover, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and Dexterity Saving Throws, and the rat moves with it. The creature may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, dislodging the rat on a success.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The frog makes one bite attack against a Small or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) acid damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Jumpy
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a melee attack, the frog may impose disadvantage on the attack. If the attack misses, the frog may jump up to 20 ft. without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Poisonous
entries: A creature that hits the toad with a melee attack using Natural Weapons takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage. If this damage reduces the toad to 0 hit points, the attacker must succeed on a {@dc 9} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The toad can breathe air and water

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the toad remains motionless, it resembles a rock and may attempt to hide without obscurement.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The frog can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The frog's long jump is up to 10 ft. and its high jump is up to 5 ft., with or without a running start.

reaction.name: Jumpy
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with a melee attack, the frog may impose disadvantage on the attack. If the attack misses, the frog may jump up to 10 ft. without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Trample
entries: If the mammoth first moves at least 20 feet on its turn, it may make a stomp attack against a {@condition prone} creature as a bonus action.

trait.name: Spear Maddened
entries: Whenever the mammoth takes damage from a spear, glaive, pike, or similar long, bladed weapon, it must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save the mammoth attacks the nearest creature it can see on its following turn.

entries: The elephant may move through the space of a Large or smaller creature without penalty. When the elephant enters a creature's space, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Howdah

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The crocodile can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

trait.name: Poison Sensitivity
entries: If the crocodile has a creature {@condition grappled} and takes 5 or more Poison damage, it immediately releases its grapple.

action.name: Death Roll {@recharge}

A creature reduced to 0 HP by this ability loses a limb (crocodile's choice). The crocodile may not use this ability if it is {@condition grappled}.
